name: Venenosa
tips: The cooldown for SHADOW BLADE refreshes when Venom kills an enemy hero. Start harvesting!

ski.name: TOOTH FOR A TOOTH
desc: Grants a shield that absorbs basic attacks for 2.5s, reflecting with physical damage and causes Movement Slow by 30% for 2s.
study: Deals counter attack physical damage and slows enemies.
update: Increased physical damage and reduced cooldown.

ski.name: SHADOW BLADE
desc: Venom transforms into a specter and dashes in a target direction, causing Stun for 0.5s to the first enemy hero unit he hits, ending the dash and then causes Movement Slow to it by 30% for 3s. Each killing blow on an enemy hero unit resets the cooldown of this ability, while each assist reduces the cooldown by 4s.
study: Charges to a target direction, stuns and slows enemy hero.

ski.name: SNAKE VENOM (PASSIVE)
desc: Venom intermittently coats his weapon with poison, passively granting bonus attack speed, while increasing bonus physical damage of his next attack and dealing damage to nearby enemies. Each enemy hero hit by this ability recovers a certain amount of Health. This ability is not affected by cooldown reduction gear. Cooldown: 4s
study: Passively increases attack speed. Next attack deals AOE damage.
update: Ability damage and bonus attack speed increased.

ski.name: SERPENT'S STRENGTH
desc: Venom awakens his ancient bloodline, restoring a few Health and gaining a massive amount of bonus attack. During this period, every enemy hero defeated refreshes the duration of this ability and restores the Health again.
study: Greatly increases Venom's Damage, resets cooldown by enemy hero kill.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

story: Venom was spawned into this world resolutely and absolutely of his own will. He believes in the purity of entropy, and in the restoration of nature to its original state of nothingness.

name: Grom
tips: Scout to take control of the battleground with your mighty hook in hand.

ski.name: MEAT HOOK
desc: ACTIVE: Launches a bloody hook at a target direction, dealing magical damage to the first enemy unit it hits, and drags it back to Grom. PASSIVE: Hooked enemy units within 3s take bonus magical damage from Grom`s basic attacks and Poison Fog.
study: Launches a hook, dragging the enemy target back to Grom.

ski.name: POISON FOG
desc: ACTIVE: Releases a poison fog, dealing continuous magical damage to nearby enemy units as well as Grom himself, while causing continuous Movement Slow by 25% to enemy units. PASSIVE: Enemy units take 50% bonus magical damage when affected by the fog for more than 2s.
study: Releases a poison fog, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

ski.name: GOBBLER (PASSIVE)
desc: PASSIVE: Grants bonus Spell Resist. Whenever an enemy hero is killed by Grom within a 1800 radius or dies within a 750 radius, Grom is granted bonus Strength permanently. Grom heals Health when enemy units and jungle creatures die within a 750 radius
data: Bonus Health: 2% from Troops and Jungle Creatures or 10% from enemy Heroes
study: Passively increases Spell Resist. Kills will grant bonus Strength
update: Bonus Spell Resist and Strength increased

ski.name: HARSH SENTENCE
desc: Passes sentence on Groms enemies, dealing continuous magical damage to enemy units in the target area while causing Suppression, and ignoring Disable Immunities. During Harsh Sentence, Grom heals 5% of his missing Health every 0.5s.
study: Suppresses and deals damage to enemy heroes within range.
update: Ability cooldown reduced and damage increased.

story: Grom will drink anyone under the table, then flip it over to start a fight. Disrespect him and you'll pay with your life - while he laughs.

name: Yang Jian
tips: Flash into the crowds and cast the ultimate ability after your enemy uses a control ability.

ski.name: Silver Halberd
desc: Yang Jian hurls a halberd to attack enemy units along its path and slow nearby enemy units after it lands on the ground, getting the vision of the halberd at the same time. (If the halberd hits an enemy hero, it stops at the hero's feet). Re-casts it to dash to the halberd's location, dealing damage and silencing nearby enemies.
data: Slow Effect: 50% (Lasts for 1 second after leaving the range.)
study: Causes damage and slowdown. Dashes at the 2nd cast.

ski.name: Shield Glare
desc: Yang Jian drains enemies' energy to slow enemy units and generates a shield for 3 seconds that blocks damage based on the number of enemy hero units hit.
study: Slows enemies and gives a shield.

ski.name: Spinning Sharp
desc: Yang Jian spins a heavy halberd around to form a whirlwind which pulls units closer and stuns them. The radius and Stun duration can be extended by channeling energy. Yang Jian is immune to control effects while channeling. If not cast in 4 seconds, the ability will be deactivated automatically and 75% of the cooldown time will be returned.
study: Pulls enemies closer and stuns them.

ski.name: Boundless Sight
desc: With the third eye open, Yang Jian receives a high bonus of Attack based on the number of nearby enemy hero units. Meanwhile, his basic attacks splash damage to adjacent units. Passive: Fully energizes Yang Jian with mana and grants bonus Attack.
study: Get buffs based on nearby enemy heroes' Health.

story:
No one knew why gods liked to place people under mountains. So many mountains looked like tombstones and once-free souls were placed under them. Maybe gods thought that the mountain never collapsed, but Yang Jian knew that there was no eternity. Sea could turn into farmland within an instant.
As the immortal of law enforcement, Yang Jian had been wearing a cold mask. He held a two-blade and three-pointed halberd in his hand and mastered the mysterious nine-turning martial arts and seventy-three metamorphoses. He could turn into numerous things to sweep away all enemies and wipe out demons and monsters for Celestial Temple and the human world. However, the sky eye on his forehead had not opened for nearly five hundred years, perhaps because he was unwilling to see his younger sister Yang Chan and his buddy monkey trapped under mountain just like his mother in the past. Yang Jian resisted, but unfortunately, he failed. His fleshy body was destroyed. Only his primordial spirit remained and had to continue to follow the order of the Celestial Temple.
The Sky Barking Hound was the only remaining partner of Yang Jian. This guy always looked up and barked at the heaven and the uncle of Yang Jian. Yang Jian was waiting in the small temple at the mouth of Guan River, waiting for the monkey to be set free and poke through the heaven together with him.

name: Arlequin
tips: Move quickly around the battleground with Sprint and use Head Shot to deal damage.

ski.name: BARRAGE
desc: Arlequin unleashes a barrage at a target area for 3s, dealing physical damage to enemy units and causing continuous Movement Slow by 25%. Against enemy units inside the Barrage, Arlequin's basic attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 3% of their max Health.
study: Unleashes a barrage of attacks in a target area, slowing enemy movement.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: SPRINT
desc: Arlequin dashes in a target direction, granting bonus attack range on her next basic attack.
study: Dashes to increase range of basic attack to 1100 for 3s.

ski.name: PROXIMITY MINE
desc: Arlequin consumes a charge to fire a devastating shrapnel in a target direction. The shrapnel explodes upon the first enemy hero unit it touches, dealing physical damage to that enemy hero unit and half damage to nearby enemy units. Shrapnel charges restore every 18 seconds, to a max of 3 charges. The charging is affected by Cooldown Reduction.
data: Damage: 175/250/325, Bonus 3% damage per 2% target Health lost
study: Charges at a target enemy unit.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: HEAD SHOT
desc: PASSIVE: Rate of critical chance increases. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown on Sprint by 0.5s. Sprint grants bonus physical damage to the next basic attack by 5s._Passive: increases .
study: Grants bonus damage to Sprint while basic attacks reduce cooldown for Sprint.

story: Arlequin is Dr. Madd's greatest creation. Her silky skin, exquisite mechanics, thunderous firepower and nano-heart... perfection! And she has generated her own personality, too!

name: Minerva
tips: Balance attacks with retreats. Control space.

ski.name: FAN OF ARROWS
desc: Shoots 6 arrows in a cone-like area, dealing magical damage and triggers Frostbite.
study: Cone-shaped range of magical damage and slowing effect.
update: Magical damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: FLUTTER FALL
desc: By the light of the moon, Minervaâ€™s speed is increased for 4 seconds. Casting blinds enemies within 850 range for 1.5 seconds.
study: Boosts attack speed and movement speed for a short period.
update: Attack speed and movement speed increased.

ski.name: MOON SHOT
desc: Shoots a crystal arrow with its own vision radius and infinite travel distance, dealing magical damage and causing Stun to the first enemy hero unit it hits, and half damage to enemy units nearby it within a 500 radius. For every 750 range the arrow travels, the Stun duration is increased by 0.5s to a maximum of 3.5s.
study: Fire an arrow to deal massive magical damage and stun the target.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: FROSTBITE
desc: PASSIVE: Minerva`s basic attacks debuffs enemy units with Frostbite, reducing attack speed and causing Movement Slow for 1.2s.
study: Each attack slows the enemy target.

story: Minerva was the most beautiful night elf in all the Dark Woods, but this very beauty also attracted the leering high priest. To remove all doubts, Minerva decided to join the devout and unmarried Royal Archers Brigade.

name: Jeanne
tips: SACRED GROUND doubles the effect of RETRIBUTION and enhaces SERAPHIM`s power!

ski.name: SACRED GROUND
desc: Summons a Sacred Ground to a target area for 5s, causing Movement Slow to enemy units and granting bonus magical damage to Retribution, while granting bonus Health Regen to allied hero units in the area.
study: Buffs allies and debuffs enemies in the target area.
update: Health Regen and Movement Slow effect increased.

ski.name: RETRIBUTION
desc: Strikes the target area 4 times with divine light, dealing magical damage to enemy units.
study: Deals magical damage to enemies in a target area.

ski.name: BLESSED AURA (PASSIVE)
desc: PASSIVE: Grants allied units within a 1500 radius bonus Armor and Health Regen. These bonuses are doubled for Jeanne.
study: Grants nearby allies bonus Armor and Health Regen.

ski.name: BLAZING SERAPHIM
desc: Summons a Seraphim from the heavens to a target area, dealing magical damage to enemy units within a 600 radius and causing Stun for 1s. The Seraphim follows Jeanne and attacks her target enemy units. The Seraphim is immune to magical damage and its attacks have a chance to deal bonus physical damage and cause a mini-Stun. Cast ability again to call the Blazing Seraphim back to Jeanne`s side.
data: Critical Chance: 30%, Critical Damage: 100/150/200, Mini-stun Duration: 0.1. (Stun duration increases to 0.5s if affected by Sacred Ground.)
study: Deals magic damage to enemy units in a target area.
update: Ability damage and Seraphim damage increased.

story: Jeanne was the last hope during the endless night. With the blessed light of Angelus conferred upon her, she cut through the darkness to lead her banners and followers to siege warfare victory.

name: Daimon
tips: Silence the enemy before using ULT to avoid being interrupted.

ski.name: PHANTOM ATTACKER
desc: Daimon hurls a phantom spear into a target, dealing damage and slowing movement speed. The spear becomes a phantom and continues attacking the target. Phantom Stats: Daimon`s Attack x 60% of Daimon Attack. Sustained Damage: 300% damage for 4s.
study: Deals damage, slowing enemy movement and summoning a phantom.
update: Damage Dealt and Slowdown Effect increase.

ski.name: SILENCING BLADE
desc: Wields blades in a frenzy to slice surrounding enemies, dealing damage and causing Silence for 1s. Phantom also mimics attacks, dealing small amount of damage.
study: Deals damage and silences enemies.

ski.name: NINJUTSU
desc: Blink to a location, reducing damage sustained for 3 seconds. If phantom is present at target location, also increases movement speed, attack damage, and Silence duration for Silencing Blade by 1 second.
study: Dashes, granting buffs.

ski.name: BLADE FLURRY
desc: Demonstrating his ultimate skill, Daimon performs a death dance, attacking up to 3 heroes within range with 8 blade waves, dealing physical damage and slowing movement 30% for 4s.
study: Deals damage and slows movement.

story: Daimon had loved martial arts ever since he was a curious and precocious youngster. As an adult, he grew blunt and straightforward, treating enemies mercilessly and refusing to toe the line.

name: Elvira
tips: Blood Infusion is also effective for gear`s damage.

ski.name: WINGED CHARGE
desc: Shapeshift into a swarm of bloodthirsty beasts to attack a line of enemy units. Become immune to all damage and deal Magical Damage for 3 seconds. Use skill again to teleport back to original location.
study: Dash damage
update: Magical Damage increases and Cooldown reduces.

ski.name: SEDUCTION
desc: Elvira gives a hickey to an enemy unit to deal Magical Damage. If enemy unit is still within 700 range of Elvira after 1.5 seconds, unit will enter a state of Confusion and suffer additional Magical Damage.
study: Magical Damage and Control.

ski.name: CRIMSON ABYSS
desc: After 1 second, Elvira teleports to the target location and deals Magical Damage to enemy units within range.
study: Deal high Continuous Damage after teleporting.
update: Magical Damage increases and Cooldown reduces.

ski.name: BLOOD INFUSION
desc: Activate Elvira's lust for blood to increase Magical Damage and receive a Magical Life Steal effect.
study: Activate Magical Life Steal and boost Magical Damage.

story: Elvira the First, queen of a faraway country, was a devout Catholic. How ironic then, that her soul should be restless - reborn by the fatal kiss of a vampire!

name: Cao Cao
tips: Use Tornado Blade at low health for more crits.

ski.name: TORNADO BLADE
desc: Cao Cao becomes a tornado of blades, dealing physical damage to nearby enemy units over 3s and becoming immune to Movement Slows.
study: Deals physical damage to nearby enemies over time.

ski.name: GLORIOUS SWORD
desc: Unleashes a blade beam a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units and causing Movement Slow. Deals double damage to enemy units facing the blade beam, and doubles the Movement Slow to enemy units facing away.
study: Deals physical damage and slows enemies in a target direction.
update: Ability damage and movement slow effect increased.

ski.name: SWORD DANCE
desc: =PASSIVE: Cao Cao can score a Lethal Blow with his basic attacks and Tornado Blade. Dealing 2x critical damage when his Health is between 51% to 100%, 2.5x critical damage when Health is between 26% to 50%, and 3x critical damage when Health is between 1% to 25%.
study: Increases critical damage according to Cao Cao`s current Health.

ski.name: UNDYING HEROISM
desc: Undying Heroism grants a state of undying, where Cao Cao cannot die. Each basic attack grants three stacks of Heroic Strength, and each ability that deals damage to enemy hero units grants one stack. Movement speed is also increased. When this state ends, Cao Cao is healed based on his stacks of Heroic Strength. If this ability is not under cooldown, it automatically activates when Cao Cao`s Health drops too low.
study: Activate to become immune from harm, and damage dealt recovers health.
update: Increases bonus healing and stacks of Heroic Strength.

story: Born with divine power, legend tells of Cao Cao being mightier than a thousand troops. With a mere pointing of his sword, state armies cowered in fear.

name: Nazar
tips: You have an ability that shows allies the enemy Hero unit`s field of vision!

ski.name: DEADLY BRUSHSTROKE
desc: ACTIVE: Nazar waves a writing brush around himself. The ink splashes nearby enemy units and deals physical damage while slowing their movement speed by 20% for 2s. Enemy units splashed by the outer circle of this ability will take bonus pure damage. PASSIVE: For every enemy hero unit hit by Deadly Brushstroke, Nazar is granted a damage bonus for 5s that stacks up to 5 times. Pure damage from the outer circle does not benefit from this damage bonus.
study: Deals damage to nearby enemy units.

ski.name: CURSED SHACKLES
desc: Nazar tosses a talisman imbued with curses, dealing physical damage to the enemy unit it clings on to. If Cursed Shackles is activated again, Nazar dashes to that enemy unit and turns the talisman into a seal, dealing physical damage and causing root for 1s.
data: Dash Physical Damage: 120/160/200/240 + 18% of its missing Health
study: Talisman deals damage to target. Dashes to and roots the target upon second cast.

ski.name: YIN-YANG JUDGMENT
desc: ACTIVE: Nazar places Yin-Yang traps under the feet of all enemy hero units, which explodes in 1.2s and deal magical damage to nearby enemy units. Nazar receives bonus movement speed for 5s and gains true sight of the enemy units._PASSIVE: The presence of enemy hero units within a 1200 radius grants Nazar 10% bonus movement speed.
study: Deals damage to enemy heroes on the entire map and increases movement speed.

ski.name: NECRO SHIELD (PASSIVE)
desc: Nazar uses the power of the dead to grant himself 1% Damage Reduction for every portion of his missing max Health.
data: Increase Damage Reduction by 1% as max Health decreases 6%/5%/4%/3%.
study: Grants Damage Reduction based on missing max Health.
update: Damage Reduction requires less missing max Health.

story: Professor Nazar was a Taoist scholar who could use runes to catch ghosts. Hating evil, Nazar hoped to get into government to use the might of the empire to bust more ghosts.

name: Borgon
tips: Shockwave costs no Mana when scoring a last hit.

ski.name: SHOCKWAVE
desc: Borgon unleashes a shockwave at a target to deal magical damage and receives Demonic Strength for 5 seconds. Demonic Strength stacks up to 3 times. Each tier increases skill`s MDMG by 30, Movement Slow by 12% and a part of Health Regen. Movement Slow lasts for 3 seconds. Recover all Mana used to cast skill if target is killed by this skill.
study: Shakes the ground, dealing damage while buffing self.
update: Increased Damage Dealt and Buff Effect.

ski.name: DEMONIC SHIELD
desc: Borgon activates a Demonic Shield which resists all damage and increases own Movement Speed for 3s.
study: Activates a shield to block damage and increase movement speed.

ski.name: RUSH TO KILL
desc: Rush towards the target, deal magical damage, and stun all enemy units within range for 1.5 seconds.
study: Charges beside a target to deal damage and stun.
update: Increased Magical Damage and reduced Cooldown.

ski.name: ANIMAL SPIRITS
desc: Awaken animal instincts to increase own Health and Health Regen.
study: Increases Max Health and Health Regen.

story: In primordial times, Borgon and his Julee tribe were the most feared. The Stompatrix had given Borgon earthquake abilities, while the Swampicorn let him rush his foes quickly. The Manticore made him tough as nails, and Chimera gave him a roar that could shake the heavens.

name: Wendy
tips: Wendy`s versatile ability set allows her to possess remarkable offensive and support capabilities.

ski.name: HAMMER TIME
desc: Wendy slows down and channels for her dash, gradually increasing its distance and damage. Release the channel to dash in a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along her path and cause knockup. The channel will cancel after 5s and refund 50% cooldown.
study: Deals damage along a path and causes knockup.

ski.name: EARTH SHAKER
desc: Wendy shakes the earth with her gigantic hammer, dealing physical damage to enemy units and reduces their damage output, while slowing their movement speed by 25% for 2s. Wendy tumbles forward from the momentum and gains 25% movement speed for 3s.
study: Damages and reduces enemy damage and movement.

ski.name: OVER THE TOP
desc: Wendy leaps into the heavens. Cast this ability again within 2s to crash down to a target point, dealing physical damage to the area and bonus physical damage to the center. The ground turns into a zone that deals continuous damage for 5s, while reducing Hammer Time`s channel time by 1x. If no target point was chosen, Wendy lands where she was.
data: Physical Damage Per Second: 30/60/90 (+5% Enemy`s Max Health)
study: Leaps and deals damage to a target area.

ski.name: IRON WILL
desc: Each of Wendy`s basic attacks and ability casts grants herself a stack of Armor and Spell Resist for 6s, up to a maximum of 10 stacks.
study: Basic attacks and ability casts grant Armor and Spell Resist.

story: Wendy was just an ordinary girl who loved cakes. But as the daughter of the general and the only contracted alchemist in the kingdom, she gave up the simple life and rode into war with her mighty warhammer to bash back the invaders.

name: Saya
tips: Equip God Hand and you will truly become divine!

ski.name: STYX AND STONES
desc: Summons a dark meteorite to smite a target area after 0.5s, dealing magical damage.
study: After a short delay, deals magical damage to a target area.

ski.name: THRILLING ENCHANTMENT
desc: Saya throws her demonic visage in a target direction. When it hits the first enemy unit or has travelled its longest distance, it expands into a Thrilling Enchantment field, causing Stun to the first enemy unit and dealing continuous magical damage to nearby enemy units, causing Movement Slow.
study: Deals damage and stuns targets hit.

ski.name: STAR OF FATE
desc: Saya locks on to an enemy hero unit and channels for a short while, calling forth a Star of Fate which deals magical damage plus bonus magical damage equal to 30% of its missing Health. This projectile can be blocked by other enemy hero units. _If Star of Fate kills an enemy hero unit, 85% of its cooldown is refunded. Star of Fate also deals magical damage to enemy non-hero units along its path and causes Stun for 0.1s.
study: Deals massive magical damage plus bonus damage.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: GHOSTLY SACRIFICE
desc: PASSIVE: Saya`s abilities debuff enemy units with Burning, which deals continuous bonus magical damage for 3s.
data: Damage per second: 1%/2%/3%/4% of target`s current Health
study: Deals bonus magic damage to targeted enemy.

story: Legend has it that those who harbor enough hate and who cherish nothing will be destined for hell. There, by blackest night, Saya is said to harvest souls.

name: Pandora
tips: Pandora grants a protective aura when close to allies.

ski.name: SONG OF DESTRUCTION
desc: Sends a note of destruction in a target direction, clinging on to the first enemy unit it hits to gain its field of vision while dealing magic damage and slowing Movement by 25% and Attack Speed by 15%. The note explodes after 2.5s, dealing magic damage to nearby enemy units.
study: Casts a song of destruction in a target direction, dealing burst damage after 3s

ski.name: WINTER'S ELEGY
desc: Plays a melancholy melody in a target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hero units it hits, causing Stun.
study: Unleashes at a target direction, stunning and dealing magic damage.
update: Increases magic damage and stun duration.

ski.name: PANDORA'S BOX
desc: Opens Pandora`s Box in a target direction, dealing magic damage to enemy units in the area and causing Stun for 1s.
study: Deals damage and disables units in a target direction.

ski.name: UPLIFTING MELODY (PASSIVE)
desc: Grants bonus Mana Regen and bonus Magic Resist for nearby allied hero units. Effect is doubled for self.
study: Increases Mana Regen and Magic Resist for nearby ally units.

story: Pandora was the most seductive trap ever created for the humans by the gods. Her box of misfortune lured in humans with its tinkling piano song before sucking them to their doom: Hades' ultimate scheme.

name: Nightshade
tips: Master of magic, Nightshade can dance throughout the battlefield.

ski.name: ECLIPSE
desc: PASSIVE: Each basic attack causes Mana Burn, which reduces Mana from the target enemy unit while dealing the same amount in magical damage. ACTIVE: A sudden strike that deals magical damage to the enemy unit and causes Movement Slow.
study: Deals magical damage to a target while slowing movement speed. Basic attacks burn mana.
update: Ability damage and Mana Burn effect increased.

ski.name: SILENT PHANTOM
desc: Teleports to a target position, dealing magical damage to enemy units within a 300 radius and causing Silence, which renders them unable to cast any abilities.
study: Teleports to a target area, silencing nearby enemies.
update: Blink range increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: NIGHT SLAYER
desc: Nightshade deals magical damage plus bonus magical damage based on the target enemy unit`s missing Mana, and causes Stun.
study: Stuns and deals magical damage to a target.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: HOURGLASS
desc: PASSIVE: Grants bonus Attack Damage and bonus Spell Resist. Every 3 basic attacks grants a shield that absorbs damage, with a 3s cooldown.
study: Grants a shield after 3 attacks.
update: Shield effect, attack damage and spell resist increased.

story: She was known as St. Mary, treasure of the night elves. Until the day came when flames from the sky scorched her forest and the cries of her clan tore open the night sky. All this came from an innocent rescue that she never thought could jeopardize her tribe. From that night on, there was only the deadly Nightshade, bloody Mary.

name: Dr. Madd
tips: The more time spent on concocting the potion, the higher its damage and controlling effects will be.

ski.name: ACIDIC BOG
desc: Unleash an Acidic Bog on the target area for 6 seconds to deal continuous damage to enemy units within and reduce their Armor.
data: Acidic Bog's Magic Damage: 80/95/110/125 per Second
study: Deals continuous damage and causes debuffs
update: Magic Damage and Debuff Effect increased, Cooldown reduced.

ski.name: EXPLOSIVE AGENT
desc: Activate and brew Explosive Agent in 4 or fewer seconds, then you have another 2 seconds to throw and deal magic damage plus stun to target. Otherwise, it stuns you instead.
study: =Deals physical damage and stuns the enemy.

ski.name: GENETIC MANIPULATION
desc: Inject bestial genes into self to gain the beast form and significantly increase Max Health, Movement Speed, Attack Speed, Health and Mana Recovery for 20 seconds.
study: Full Self Buffs.

ski.name: CORROSIVE ATTACK
desc: Dr. Maddâ€™s attacks corrode an opponentâ€™s weapon, lowering their ATK and Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Can stack up to 3 times. If the opponent is a hero, the lowered part of ATK and Attack Speed will be stolen by Dr. Madd.
study: Attacks lower target`s power.

story: Dr. Stein, who had been missing for years, was captured by the coalition. The doctor fled after releasing the G17 and R42 viruses, and coalition forces lost two divisions killing the doctor's wife. No-one knows the whereabouts of Dr. Stein and his biological weapon, which hangs over the heads of the coalition like a sword of Damocles.

name: Arborus
tips: Nature`s Vortex - Thrusting Timber - Arboreal Spin: use all three, ace your enemies.

ski.name: ARBOREAL SPIN
desc: Arborus musters the mysterious power of the forest and releases entangling roots, dealing magical damage to nearby enemy units within a 550 radius, and causing Root for 1s.
study: Traps and deals magical damage to nearby enemies.

ski.name: THRUSTING TIMBER
desc: Dashes at a target enemy unit, dealing magical damage and causing Stun, while reducing all incoming damage to Arborus for 3s.
study: Rushes to a target, stunning and dealing magical damage.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: NATURE'S VORTEX
desc: Creates a vortex, dealing magical damage to all enemy units within the area when the vortex ends. Cast this ability again to end nature`s vortex early. The vortex amplifies its maximum damage for up to 3s, afterwards it has to be released within 2s.
study: Deals magical damage to enemy units within range.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: SAPLING EXPLOSION
desc: Hurls a sapling towards a target area, dealing magical damage to nearby enemy units as it lands. The sapling will then follow a nearby enemy unit and detonate, dealing magical damage. Saplings can live up to 30s.
study: Hurl a sapling at a target area, dealing magical damage.

story: Arborus was the most prestigious Taoist of his time and a dedicated, if hermetic, exorcist. One day, he retrieved an antique oolong teapot, with a tea spirit lived inside! In cooperation with such forces, Arborus' Taoist powers were greatly enhanced.

name: Sylvana
tips: Continuously harass enemies while healing our allied heroes.

ski.name: Entangling Roots
desc: Releases energy roots towards the target direction, dealing damage to enemies along the path. When hitting the first enemy hero or reaching the maximum distance, the energy roots explode and entangle, rooting all enemy units within range.
study: Deals damage and causes a crowd control effect.

ski.name: Forest's Blessing
desc:
Purifies an allied hero and grants continuous healing and Speedup effects to all allied heroes within range for 3s. (This ability can be cast while moving and is not affected by cooldown reduction effects.)
Purification: Removes crowd control effects (except Suppress, Blind, Taunt, and Knock-back) and other negative effects.
study: Applies purification, healing, and speedup effects.

ski.name: Forest's Prayer
desc: After a brief chant, Sylvana creates a healing sanctuary in the target area for 6s, providing continuous healing to all allied units within the area.
study: After a brief chant, applies an AoE healing effect in the target area.

ski.name: Power Infusion
desc: Sylvana infuses energy towards the target direction, gradually accelerating as it travels, dealing damage and applying a 2-second Slow effect to enemies along the path. When reaching the maximum speed, it also silences enemies for 1.25s.
study: Causes damage and Slow.

story:
Sylvana, the Daughter of the Forest, was the only offspring left by Moon God in the world. She inherited powerful mana and a pure heart from her mother Moon God. Sylvana had been following the tree tender Wood and learning the laws of nature and attentive meditation since her childhood. After infinite days, the naughty Sylvana grew into a wise dryad leader and became the new forest guardian in replacement of the late Wood.
When the Demon Legion invaded the continent and trampled on the life of people, Sylvana used the power of nature to resist invaders flexibly by virtue of the forest that she loved. Tough vines made it impossible for her opponents to move and all curses were useless in her eyes. Due to her activeness, intruders suffered heavy losses and chose to retreat. However, the evil fire and death that they left still swallowed the entire forest quickly. Sylvana sacrificed her life resolutely for the homeland that she loved, remedying the entire forest. She finally disappeared in the nectar under the moon, only leaving a jade cane for the people in the forest to shed tears and yearn for.

name: Tartorus
tips: Use Spirit Beast in a safe zone to avoid it being interrupted.

ski.name: CHARGE
desc: Tartorus tunnels forward skewering enemy units in his path to deal Magical Damage and causing knockup for 1s.
study: Dash, deal damage, and knockup enemies in pathã€‚

ski.name: SILENT STORM
desc: Tartorus summons a sandstorm at the casting location which prevents enemy units from tracking him. Sandstorm deals Magical Damage every second to enemy units while also granting damage reduction._Cast again to cancel ability.
study: Become Invisible and deal continuous damage.
update: Increase damage and increase Invisible duration.

ski.name: POISONED SPIT
desc: Poison a target enemy unit to deal continuous Magical Damage over 5s. If target dies from this ability, the poison will infect another enemy unit within a range of 600.
study: Infect target with contagious poison.

ski.name: SPIRIT BEAST
desc: Tartorus chants for 1s and then summons seismic waves to deal Magical Damage to enemy units within range for 4s. Waves also cause 35% Movement Slow for 3s. Grants a Damage Reduction effect while ability is active.
data: Magical Damage per Hit: 60/80/100 (+2% of Max Health)
study: Summon seismic activity for massive damage.
update: Increase damage and number of attacks, decrease cooldown.

story: The benevolent beast Tartorus was revered in the north as a patron saint. When the southern armies invaded with Byakkus, Tartorus stepped up to protect the fatherland.

name: Lilith
tips: Pair low health troops with Fiery Rush to charge.

ski.name: FIERY RUSH
desc: Dashes at a target enemy unit and performs a basic attack with bonus physical damage, the bonus physical damage is doubled against troops. If the enemy unit dies from this ability, Fiery Rush`s cooldown is reset and Lilith is refunded 70% of its mana cost. The cooldown also resets when Lilith kills an enemy hero unit. Passive: Killing an enemy unit will refresh this ability`s cooldown.
study: Charges the target and deals physical damage.

ski.name: FIRED BLADES
desc: Sacrificing her own Health, Lilith enchants her blades with blistering fire. Deals pure damage to a target enemy unit and causes Movement Slow. If the enemy unit`s Health percentage is higher than Lilith, cause Stun instead.
study: Deals Pure Damage and slows/stuns a target.

ski.name: EXPLODING BLOOM
desc: Summons a blazing lotus that shoots a flame dart every second, dealing magical damage to a random nearby enemy unit at 100% Spell Life Steal, healing Health based on flat damage dealt. Prioritizes enemy hero units.
study: Deals magical damage around Lilith over time.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: PROTECTIVE GLOBE
desc: PASSIVE: Each time Lilith loses 400 Health, Protective Globe deals magical damage to nearby enemy units.
study: Deals magical damage to nearby enemies once triggered.

story: Restrained by her demonic contract, Lilith toiled for three days and three nights before breaking free and kidnapping Solomon's soul to hell, where he hangs crucified on the entrance gates as a warning to all.

name: Tiamat
tips: Cast Stone Barrier to rush into the battlefield and save your allies.

ski.name: CRAZED CHARGE
desc: Roll like a wild boulder towards an enemy target to stun them for 0.5 seconds, deal Magical Damage, and reduce their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.
study: Charge towards a target to deal Damage and cause Stun.

ski.name: EARTHSHOCK
desc: Taunt nearby enemies causing them to attack you. Also deals damage to targets.
study: =Taunt enemies nearby to force them to attack you.

ski.name: FIGHT TOGETHER
desc: Select an ally and activate earthen resonance around them for protection. After 2.5 seconds, teleport to the selected ally hero. Teleport may be canceled within these 2.5 seconds, partially refunding cooldown. Earthen resonance protection may last for up to 5 seconds.
study: Increase own Armor and Spell Resist. Chance to counter when attacked.
update: Increase own Armor, Spell Resist, and Physical Damage.

ski.name: PROTECTIVE ARMOR
desc: Tiamat receives bonus Armor and Spell Resist. When being hit by an attack which deals Physical Damage, 30% chance to counter and deal Physical Damage to a nearby enemy unit.
study: Deals damage while restoring health.

story: In ancient times, Quetzalcoatl came to the people's temple and built a guardian out of stone - Tiamat - to act as his emissary. Tiamat dutifully performed the will of the deity and never disobeyed.

name: Raven
tips: Use Phoenix power toegether with Golden Chakram.

ski.name: SUNFIRE
desc: ACTIVE: grants bonus Armor and bonus Spell Resist. PASSIVE: Grants bonus Health Regen.
data: Bonus Armor: 24/30/36/42, Bonus Spell Resist: 5/10/15/20 for 5s.
study: Increases Health Regen. Activate to increase Armor and Spell Resist.
update: Health regen, Spell Resist and Armor increased.

ski.name: GOLDEN CHAKRAM
desc: ACTIVE: Hurls a golden chakram in a target direction that deals magical damage and bounces between enemy units, dealing reduced damage with each bounce. PHOENIX FORM: Shoots forth a fiery blaze, with increased effect radius.
data: Magic damage to first unit: 120/160/200/240, Damage Reduction per hit: 15%, Min Damage: 40%.
study: Deals magical damage in a target direction.

ski.name: PHOENIX POWER
desc: Passive: When in the Phoenix state, Raven scorches nearby enemies. This damage does not trigger Internal Fire._Passive: Upon death, Raven fuses into an egg that has 60% of Raven`s maximum Health. If the egg remains unattacked for a short period, Raven respawns with 50% maximum Health. Effect may be triggered once every 60s. Active: Enters the Phoenix state, boosting Raven`s attack power and enhancing basic attacks into ranged attacks. 35 Health is deducted per second. Re-cast Phoenix Power again to return to human form.
data: Health drained per second: 35, Bonus Movement Speed: 10%/15%/20%, Bonus Damage: 40/55/70
study: Changes form to get stronger, turns into a sun upon death.
update: Movement speed, damage, and magical damage increased.

ski.name: INTERNAL FIRE
desc: PASSIVE: Raven`s basic attacks and abilities debuff enemy units with stacks of Burning, dealing continuous magical damage. At 4 Burning stacks, deals explosive magical damage to enemy units while causing Movement Slow, and consumes the stacks.
data: Damage per second: 7/8/9/10. Duration: 5s, Explosion at 4 Stacks: 150/175/200/225
study: Deals bonus damage and slows target after being hit 5 times.

story: In primordial times, ten suns appeared in the sky. Solus took up his bow and arrow and shot nine suns out of the sky, sending them crashing to earth. Their bodies looked like giant golden ravens. The universe was dark, and only the glimmer of the godsoul remained. The gods had no choice but to reignite a single sun-raven.

name: Damacus
tips: Knockup with Eastern Wind, then drop Eight Trigrams to land a perfect combo.

ski.name: LIGHTNING STORM
desc: Damacus summons a lightning storm, dealing magical damage to multiple enemy units. Each ability level hits an additional 1 enemy unit.
study: Magical Damage To Multiple Targets.
update: Increased Magical Damage and Enemy Units Hit.

ski.name: EIGHT TRIGRAMS
desc: Damacus places an Eight Trigrams at the target area which activates after 1s, dealing magical damage to enemy units and causes Frozen.
study: Magical Damage, Area Frozen.

ski.name: EASTERN WIND
desc: Damacus releases winds from the east in a target direction, dealing magical damage to enemy units along its path and causing Knockup for 1s.
study: Deals massive magical damage at a target direction.

ski.name: WAVE OF INK
desc: Damacus paints with his brush and unleashes up to 5 waves of ink dragons in an area in front, dealing massive magical damage to enemy units within the area.
study: Massive Magical Damage.

story: Damacus, a famous statesman, ideologist and strategist, was wooed and recruited by the virtuous general Liu Bei. And he demonstrated his wisdom and talent with his achievements.

name: Rockman
tips: Use Meteor Shower: it is your key skill.

ski.name: METEOR SHOWER
desc: Summons a meteor shower, dealing magic damage to nearby enemy units and debuffing them with 1 stack(s) of Meteor for 8s, up to 3 stacks. Deals bonus magic damage to enemy units based on their Meteor stacks.
study: Deals magic damage to nearby enemies.
update: Ability damage and bonus damage increased.

ski.name: LIVING STONE
desc: Activates the chaotic energies inside Rockman, granting bonus Movement Speed to Rockman while causing Movement Slow against nearby enemy units for 3s.
study: Increases movement speed while slowing nearby enemies.

ski.name: ROCKSKIN
desc: PASSIVE: Grants Rockman bonus Health Regen and bonus Armor.
study: =Grants Rockman bonus Health Regen and Armor.

ski.name: METEOR POWER
desc: PASSIVE: Each cast of Meteor Shower grants Rockman a stack that reduces incoming damage, up to 4 stacks. ACTIVE: Rockman unleashes the power of the meteors, dealing magic damage to nearby enemy units and causing Movement Slow for 2.5s. Meteor Power deals bonus magic damage to enemy units based on their Meteor stacks.
study: (Passive) Increases immunity. (Active) Deals area of effect damage.

story: When the pillars of Heaven collapsed to ancient floods, Goddess Nuwa used her supernatural powers to merge together a special rock. Ten thousand years of geological pressure and earthly processes evolved this rock into a human shape.

name: Guan Yu
tips: Less health means more power for this character.

ski.name: UNSTOPPABLE FORCE
desc: Dashes towards a target area, dealing physical damage to enemy units within the area. This ability can help Guan Yu escape from danger.
data: Physical Damage:150/200/250/300, Bonus Damage: Physical damage equal to 60 % of attack
study: Leaps to the target area, dealing physical damage.

ski.name: DOUBLE BLOW
desc: Picking up the pace, Guan Yu summons 2 spirits to deal physical damage to a target enemy unit, and causing Root.
data: Damage: 120/160/200/240, Bonus Damage: Physical damage equal to 60% of attack
study: Deals physical damage and roots the target.

ski.name: CRESCENT BLADE
desc: ACTIVE: Guan Yu turns into a tornado of destruction for 3s, dealing continuous physical damage to nearby enemy units while becoming immune to magical damage and disables.
data: Damage per 0.5s: 60/100/140  plus 50% Guan Yu's Damage
study: Deal continuous physical damage and immune to Spell

ski.name: ART OF WARFARE
desc: PASSIVE: Guan Yu's mastery of warfare grants him bonus dodge. Each ability cast turns the next basic attack into a guaranteed critical strike.
study: Passively increases dodge chance and grants critical attack.
update: Dodge chance increased and cooldown reduced.

story: His name is Guan Yu and he stood seven feet tall, half as thick, with rich, thick features illustrating his awe-inspiring face. More than a man, he was his own culture, his own way of life.

name: Rahotep
tips: Soul Leash works best when used together with Rotting Corpse.

ski.name: ROTTING CORPSE
desc: ACTIVE: The vile stench from RahotepÂ·s sarcophagus causes continuous magical damage to enemy units within the area for 10s.
study: Continuous Magical Damage.

ski.name: QUICKSAND
desc: ACTIVE: Calls upon the power of the sands to gain bonus movement speed, and summons quicksand at the target area for 5s, causing movement slow to enemy units inside. The Movement Slow persists for another 2s on enemy units after they leave the area.
data: Area Movement Slow: 20%/25%/30%/35%, Bonus Movement Speed: 30%
study: Bonus Movement Speed, Area Movement Slow.

ski.name: SOUL LEASH
desc: ACTIVE: Forcefully drags target enemy hero unit along for 3s, this effect can not be interrupted.
study: Drags enemy unit, Continuous Magical Damage.

ski.name: REFLECTIVE NIGHTMARE
desc: PASSIVE: Rahotep`s cursed mirror grants bonus Spell Resist and causes Cursed to enemy units that perform basic attacks on Rahotep, which deals continuous magical damage and causes Attack Speed Slow for 4s.
data: Magical Damage Per Sec: 10/20/30/40 (+1% Max Health)
study: Bonus Spell Resist, Causes Cursed.
update: Increased Bonus Spell Resist and Cursed Effect.

story: In ancient Egypt, the Pharaoh was not only the supreme ruler but also the most powerful priest. And Rahotep was the best of them all.

name: Diao Chan
tips: A well-timed Dropdead Gorgeous will absolutely demolish the enemy team.

ski.name: DROPDEAD GORGEOUS
desc: Diao Chan sends a kiss in a target direction, dealing magical damage to enemy units along its path. The kiss latches on to the first enemy hero unit and causes Charmed for 1s, and afterward causes it to become Mesmerized which reduces its damage output for 5s. While inside Moonflower Dance, Dropdead Gorgeous also causes Enamored which turns the enemy hero unit into a neutral unit, rendering it attackable by both sides for 1s.
study: Magical damage, cause debuffs.
update: Magical Damage and Debuff Effect increased and Cooldown reduced.

ski.name: HEART TO HEART
desc: ACTIVE: Diao Chan tosses a heart at an allied hero unit, granting it bonus Life Steal and bonus attack speed for 5s while the heart emits projectiles to attack nearby enemy units. Diao Chan also gains Committed for 5s which increases bonus movement speed and bonus spell power._PASSIVE: Heart projectiles deal bonus magical damage to enemy units inside Moonflower Dance.
data: While Inside Moonflower Dance_Bonus Movement Speed: 15%, From Committed_Bonus Spell Power:10/20/30/40
study: Buff Allied Units.

ski.name: MOONFLOWER DANCE
desc: Diao Chan dances under the moonlight, summoning a flowerbed for 5s that grants allied hero units bonus Health Regen, bonus Armor and bonus Spell Resist. While inside the flowerbed, Diao Chan gains bonus Damage Reduction and any damage reduced this way will become evenly split onto enemy units within a 1000 radius. The flowerbed causes Root for 0.5s to enemy units that step in it for the first time.
study: Heals and Buffs.
update: Buff Effect increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: BEAUTIFUL
desc: PASSIVE: Diao Chan's abilities cause Infatuated to enemy units for 3s, which causes them to lose Health and reduces their Movement Speed by 10%. When enemy units with Infatuated go near each other, their Infatuated turn into Aggravated which doubles their Health loss, reduces their Armor and Spell Resist, and grants them increased damage output by 10%. PASSIVE: Grants bonus movement speed to allied hero units in the area. While inside Moonflower Dance, the bonus movement speed is raised to 15%.
data: While Aggravated: Reduced Armor:  7/11/15/19, Reduced Spell Resist: 2/4/6/8
study: Heals and Buffs.
update: Movement Speed and Debuff Effect increased.

story: Diao Chan wore dazzling jewelry and her elegant saunter was like a willow in the breeze. In a world of raging testosterone and warfare, she showed how a woman's wisdom and wiles can conquer everything.

name: Zhao Yun
tips: Equip Dodge Stone and go bananas!

ski.name: DRAGON RAGE
desc: Dashes at a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along his path. DragonÂ·s Spirit triggers immediately after casting this ability.
study: Deals damage to enemy units along the path.

ski.name: DRAGON-COIL SPEAR
desc: Dodges all physical attacks for 2.5s, while gaining 30% Damage Reduction against enemy Area of Effect abilities. After 2.5s has passed or if this ability is activated again, Zhao Yun will counter attack all enemy units within range and cause Stun for 1s. Each successful dodge grants 15% bonus physical damage to the counter attack, up to 4 stacks and 60% bonus physical damage.
study: Activate to dodge physical attacks and counter attack.
update: Increases damage reflected and reduced cooldown.

ski.name: DRAGON'S SPIRIT
desc: PASSIVE: Every third attack on the same enemy unit deals bonus physical damage and causes Movement Slow by 50% for 1.5s._PASSIVE: Zhao Yun's inner Dragon's Spirit grants him bonus Attack Damage.
study: Slowing the target after attacking it 3 times.

ski.name: INVINCIBLE
desc: Dashes at a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along his path, dragging them to the destination and causing knockup. Zhao Yun gains Hyper Armor during the dash which renders him immune to disables, and gains Damage Reduction after the dash. If this ability hits an enemy hero unit, Zhao Yun also gains bonus Attack Speed.
study: Attack sped and movement speed increased.
update: Attack sped and movement speed increased.

story: During the time of three warring kingdoms, an unforgettable silver lining emerged: the white knight, Zhao Yun! After being convinced by Liu Bei, he fought all over the realm, never ceding loyalty - even in death.

name: Absalon
tips: Cast from enemy`s blind spots or rely on teamwork to improve your odds of landing Fiery Meteor.

ski.name: FLAME WAVE
desc: Absalon attacks with a flame wave, dealing magical damage to all enemy units along its path and causing Stun for 1s.
study: Magical Damage, Stun.

ski.name: FIERY RAIN
desc: Summons a fiery rain at the target area, dealing magical damage to enemy units and causing Burn for 3s.
study: Continuous Magical Damage.

ski.name: FIERY METEOR
desc: ACTIVE: Summons 1 fiery meteor to bombard the target area, dealing massive magical damage to enemy units and causing Stun for 2s. Absalon needs to channel for 1s to cast this ability.
study: Massive Magical Damage, Stun.
update: Magical Damage increased and Cooldown reduced.

ski.name: LIQUID FIRE
desc: PASSIVE: Absalon`s basic attacks and abilities inject enemy units with liquid fire, causing Burn for 4s, stacking up to 3 times.
study: On-hit magical damage to basic attacks and abilities.

story: Absalon was a skilled strategist. Born in troubled times, they used to call him Sinister. Skilled in both culture and war, no matter whether he's talking battle strategy or leading troops, he was superior to all.

name: Lu Bu
tips: Each attack causes unbearable pain to the enemy.

ski.name: BLOODY WHIRL
desc: Deals physical damage to nearby enemy units within a 500 radius, causing Movement Slow for 3s.
study: Deals physical damage to nearby enemies.

ski.name: WHIRLING CHARGE
desc: Dashes at a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along Lu Bu's path, causing Stun for 1.75s at the end of the dash. Can cast up to 3 times within 3s.
study: Dashes on the third cast, dealing physical damage and causing Stun.

ski.name: PEERLESS
desc: Deals massive physical damage to a target enemy unit, plus bonus physical damage based on the Strength difference between the target enemy unit and Lu Bu. Passive: Boosts Lu Bu's Strength.
study: Deals massive damage plus bonus damage

ski.name: PERVERSITY
desc: Passively grants Tearing effect to all abilities and attacks, dealing bonus magic damage based on the target`s maximum Health.
study: Each ability or attack inflicts bonus magic damage.

story: Praised as the top general during the Three Kingdoms period, but damned for his heritage, Lu Bu was a fearless and battle lusting warrior who took an enormous amount of pleasure in fighting.

name: Zeus
tips: Supreme Authority allows you to switch to ranged mode at will.

ski.name: SUPREME AUTHORITY
desc: ACTIVE: Zeus reshapes the laws of space for 5s, the range of his basic attacks becomes 800 and now deal on-hit area bonus magical damage.
study: Attack Range and Area Magical Damage increase.

ski.name: ROLLING THUNDER
desc: ACTIVE: Zeus transforms into a ball of lightning, reducing damage taken and dealing continuous magical damage to nearby enemy units for up to 3s. Cast again during this period to dash to the target point, dealing magical damage to enemy units along his path, and then bonus magical damage to the target area, causing Paralyze. If no target point was chosen, Zeus lands where he was. Each basic attack reduces the cooldown of this ability.
study: Ball Lightning, Dash, Magical Damage.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: ABSOLUTE DECREE
desc: ACTIVE: Zeus envelopes himself with a zone of lightning, gaining bonus Damage Reduction and dealing continuous magical damage to enemy units within a 800 radius for 5s. During this period, each basic attack causes a thunderous explosion, dealing magical damage to all enemy units inside the zone.
study: Lightning Zone, Increased Magical Damage.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: GODLY EMPOWERMENT
desc: PASSIVE: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his basic attacks deal on-hit bonus magical damage.
study: Bonus Attack Speed, On-hit Magical Damage.
update: Magical Damage and Attack Speed increased.

story: Born in Crete, Zeus was the leader of the gods, who reigned over Mt. Olympus, the master of thunder and romance. He was the aggressor who provoked Prometheus over fire: cold, ruthless and wrathful.

name: Rena
tips: Select ability combos based on enemies' status to perform explosive attacks efficiently.

ski.name: Spirit Possession
desc:
Summons a fox spirit to charge forward, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path. If it hits an enemy hero, deals magic damage and applies a number of Possession Stamps based on Rena's current stacks of Charm Surge.
Possession Stamp: Slows the target for 3s. All the stamps explode if the target takes magic damage from Rena (except item abilities and effects), each dealing true damage equal to a certain percentage of the target's Max Health.
study: Deals magic damage and true damage.

ski.name: Demonic Strike
desc:
Unleashes demonic power to a fan-shaped area in front. The area of effect is divided into two parts. In the outer part, the power becomes ground spikes to deal magic damage and the final damage may increase based on Rena's stacks of Charm Surge. While in the inner part, it deals 2/3 of the damage.
Damage Boost: Each stack of Charm Surge grants a fixed percentage of damage. All these percentages add together to increase the final damage.
study: Deals massive damage to enemies.

ski.name: Illusive Charm
desc:
Summons a charming shadow to dash forward, dealing magic damage to and alluring an enemy hero it encounters while applying Soulcurses.
Allure: Tempts the target to walk towards Rena for 0.6s. The duration extends by 0.1s for every certain distance from the target hit (Maximum Range: 1400). Allure doesn't apply again while Soulcurse is active.
Soulcurse: Applies Soulcurses which are three times the number of the magical tails sacrificed while casting the ability, lasting for a while. During the period, death of an enemy hero restores Rena's magical tails equal to the number of Soulcurses.
study: Deals magic damage to and allures.

ski.name: Charm Surge
desc:
Charm Surge: No cooldowns on all abilities. Sacrifices her magical tails to use this ability and waits 3s to enter the Charm Surge status. Charm Surge is stacked immediately after using the ability and takes effect. The number of Charm Surge stacks is equal to the number of magical tails sacrificed. Stacks Charm Surge up to 9 times, each giving bonus Movement Speed. Under the status of Charm Surge, using this ability again increases the number of magical tails sacrificed by 1, up to 3. Rena has 9 magical tails initially and restores 1 tail at set intervals except during the Charm Surge status. Every 1% Cooldown Reduction obtained from items gets converted into 1 Magic Power.
Resentment: Rena restores all her magical tails upon her own death and continues to act for a while, becoming Untouchable. During the period, participating in kills reduces the time required to revive by 20% per kill. This status ends early when running out of magical tails.
study: Casts the ability continuously and increases movement speed.

story:
On the glorious painting unscrolled, the fairy fox saw a kingdom with prosperous landscapes and the king was waiting at the end of a flower road. Did she accept the arrangement that would make her the queen of the most powerful king?
Ten years have passed in a flash and the fairy fox has become the king's most loved queen named Rena. People fell down and praised in adoration to her beauty, but she was still in the pain of missing someone. When the palace gates were broke through, she felt like falling into an endless abyss along with the perfect world. No one could escape the fate.
As the flame of war burnt itself out, Rena woke up from the dream. She bowed down to the divine master, then left for the love she was longing for.

name: Lapina
tips: Plant Bunny Stunners in blind spots while laning!

ski.name: RABBIT SPEED
desc: Lapina leaps to the target area and gains bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed. If there is a friendly unit, enemy unit or a Bunny Stunner near the landing point, Lapina will leap again in the direction of the left joystick.
study: Leaps to the target area and leaps again if there`s a unit nearby.
update: Increased bonus attack speed, reduced cooldown.

ski.name: BUNNY BOMB
desc: Lapina tosses a Bunny Bomb at a target area that deals physical damage to enemy units and causes Movement Slow for 2s. Causes Stun for 1s to enemy units hit by the center of the explosion.
study: Deals physical damage to the area and causes Stun to the units in the center.
update: Increased damage and slow, reduced cooldown.

ski.name: BUNNY STUNNER
desc: =Lapina can hold up to 3 Bunny Stunners. Plants a Bunny Stunner, granting true sight on enemy units that enter its radius and causing slow by 35%. The Bunny Stunner then detonates for physical damage and causes slow by 35% for 1.5s. If left untriggered, Bunny Stunners become invisible after 2s.
study: harges at a target enemy unit.
update: Ability damage increased, and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: LUCKY BUNNY
desc: =Each basic attack on an enemy unit grants 1 stack of Lucky Bunny. When Lapina has 4 or 5 stacks, the next basic attack will deal increased damage. Basic attacks against enemy units under Movement Slow from Bunny Bomb or Bunny Stunner will grant 2 stacks.
study: At max stacks, the next basic attack deals increased damage.

story: The god of the east forged the soul of a bunny with a carnation, transferring romance elements from flower to rabbit. The carnation heart of this rabbit, Lapina, gave her a soul particularly sensitive to others.

name: Bombom
tips: Immortal Dance deals double damage to troops.

ski.name: SEVEN-FISTED PUNCH
desc: Dashes in a target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy unit he hits, and causing a mini-Stun. Then deals 50% physical damage to enemy units within a 400 radius around the first enemy unit. Bombom takes recoil damage from Seven-Fisted Punch.
data: Physical Damage: 220/280/340/400, Bonus Physical Damage: 8% of Self`s Max Health
study: Deals physical damage to target and nearby enemies.

ski.name: IRON TUNIC
desc: Incredible pain tolerance allows Bombom to endure more damage. Activate to grant Bombom bonus Armor and an aura that causes continuous Movement Slow to nearby enemy units for 5s, while reducing the cooldown of other active abilities by 1s whenever Bombom performs a basic attack, and by 1s whenever damaged by a basic attack.
study: Grants bonus Armor, slows nearby enemies and reduces cooldown.

ski.name: IMMORTAL DANCE
desc: Bombom dashes at the target enemy unit, unleashing a flurry of lethal punches to enemy units within the area. Each punch deals physical damage plus bonus physical damage equal to Bombom`s Strength. Deals double damage against enemy non-hero units.
study: Deal physical damage to targets in affected area.

ski.name: SECRET MEDICINE (PASSIVE)
desc: PASSIVE: Secret Medicine awakens the healing energies within Bombom. When his Health drops below 30%, Secret Medicine automatically heals 30% Health within 6s.
study: Restores health upon casting.

story: During religious wars, a great panda monk came to be known. After escaping from prison, Bombom completely forgave his jailers and instilled the concept of compassion in his enemies. He transcended evil through tolerance and forgiveness.

name: Hattori
tips: Shadowfang`s exquisite double damage will leave you surprised and satisfied.

ski.name: SHURIKEN
desc: Throw shadow blades dripping in acid at a line of enemy units. Deals damage to enemy units while reducing Movement Speed by 50%.
study: Physical Damage, Reduce Movement Speed.

ski.name: SHINOBI HONOR
desc: Hattori unleashes his Shinobi Honor and teleports to the closest unit. If the unit is an ally, Hattori grants a defensive shield to them which partially reduces damage for 3 seconds. If the unit is an enemy, Hattori deals damage and Silences them.
study: Deal damage to enemy units and either Silence targets or provide allies with a shield.

ski.name: SHADOWFANG
desc: Assassinate an enemy unit to deal massive damage. Enemy unit will take double damage if their back is to Hattori.
study: Massive Physical Damage.

ski.name: CHIDORI
desc: Hattori unleashes an incredible flurry of attacks to deal massive damage to all enemy units within range and enters a state of Divine Mist and stealth. Reduce Ultimate cooldown timer by 20s if an enemy is killed.
study: Invisible, Speed Up, deal high damage.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

story: Hattori, a vassal for Tokugawa Ieyasu, was a member of the Japanese Brotherhood of Assassins. Aside from the ninja arts, he was also trained as a samurai, and his skill with the yari was legendary.

name: Diana
tips: Use Hunter`s Dash to confound your enemies.

ski.name: SOUL SHOCK
desc: Fires a bolt at a target enemy unit, dealing physical damage and causing 500 knockback. ENHANCED: Can cast 2 times. First bolt deals physical damage and causes Root for 1s, second bolt deals half damage and causes knockback.
study: Knocks back the target. Can trap target after enhanced.

ski.name: HUNTER'S DASH
desc: Dashes in a target direction. Diana's next basic attack within 3s deals bonus physical damage. ENHANCED: Gain Invisible for 1s at the end of the dash.
study: Leap and grant bonus physical damage; become invisible after enhanced.

ski.name: DIVINE POWER
desc: Enhance Soul Shock: Can cast 2 times. Bolt the first deal physical damage and causes Root for 1s while bolt the second deal within 3s half the damage and causes knockback. Enhance Hunter`s Dash: Gain Invisible for 1s at the end of the dash._Enhance Curse of Flesh: Ignores Armor and Damage Reduction effects.
study: Effects of Soul Shock, Hunter`s Dash and Curse of Flesh upgraded.

ski.name: CURSE OF FLESH
desc: Each basic attack debuffs a target enemy unit with 1 stack of Curse for 5s. The next basic attack triggers the Curse, dealing bonus damage. Curse can stack up to 3 times. ENHANCED: Ignores Armor and Damage Reduction effects.
study: Attacks deal bonus physical damage, ignores Armor after enhanced.

story: Cherith was the demoness of the night and the daughter of Satan. Unlike her fun-loving sisters, Cherith was far more dangerous and ambitious. She wanted to turn all of the human jurisdiction into monster territory. However, Diana the Huntress kept blocking her plan, and she chased Diana back to the human citadel.

name: Psion
tips: Psion excels in dealing with stragglers.

ski.name: PSIONIC STORM
desc: Summons a black hole which increases the Attack Damage of the next 5 attacks. Also deals Physical Damage to enemy units in a line up to a range of 600. Effect lasts for up to 10s.
study: Increase AoE damage of following basic attacks.

ski.name: DECAY
desc: Shoot a decaying orb in the target direction which decreases Armor and deals Physical Damage to enemy units along its path. The orb will convert a portion of the enemy units' energy to increase your own Movement Speed. All effects last for 7s.
study: Shoot a decaying orb, increase own Movement Speed, and decrease target`s Armor.
update: Armor Reduction increased and Cooldown reduced.

ski.name: HIDDEN ARMOR
desc: Armor is imbued with powers which grant Invisibility while not attacking. Using any items (except healing abilities) will disrupt Invisibility. Basic attacks targeting enemy heroes will instead Blink you behind the target to deliver attacks. This ability has an initial range of 750 and may only be used once every 6s against the same target. Manually cast this ability to immediately become Invisible.
study: Remain Invisible while not attacking. Attacks have additional effects when not Invisible..

ski.name: PSIONIC BULLY
desc: If no other enemy heroes are within a range of 750 of the target enemy hero, activate Psionic Bully to deal additional Pure Damage. Pure Damage may not be limited by an effects. All attacks delivered from behind enemy heroes will deal additional Physical Damage.
data: Basic Attack Pure Damage to Heroes: 70/110/150/190
study: Deal bonus Pure Damage to isolated enemy heroes.

story: Psion, the youngest general in the alliance, was trained by the great Master. He inherited the integrity, resilience and selflessness of this brave tradition. However, these same qualities would bring him nothing but trouble.

name: Poseidon
tips: Soul of the Sea outflanks & sneaks up on foes!

ski.name: TIDAL BARRAGE
desc: Unleashes a tidal wave at a target direction, dealing magical damage to enemy units and causing Movement Slow for 2s.
study: Deals magical damage and slows enemies.

ski.name: SOUL OF THE SEA
desc: =Poseidon transforms into the soul of the sea, becoming Untouchable. Deals magical damage to nearby enemy units for 2s.
study: Deals magical damage to nearby enemies and becomes invincible.

ski.name: POSEIDON'S TRIDENT
desc: Poseidon throws his trident in a target direction, dealing magical damage to enemy units along its path and drags them to its destination, where a rising torrent causes knockup and deals magical damage to nearby units, then causing Stun for 2s.
study: Knocks back enemies, then deals magical damage and stunning enemies in the affected area.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: OCEANIC POWER
desc: PASSIVE: Every 4s, Poseidon`s next basic attack deals on-hit magical damage and generates a zone with Oceanic Power around the target enemy unit for 2s, granting Poseidon bonus Spell Power and 35% bonus movement speed while inside the zone, as well as bonus Spell Power against enemy units that are inside the zone.
study: Basic attacks inflict bonus magic damage, and grants bonus spell power.
update: Ability damage and Spell Power increased.

story: Since being crowned god of the seas, Poseidon ruled over the ocean with his trident. For the first time ever, humans were separated from the domain of the gods. No one dared to challenge Poseidon's jurisdiction.

name: Sun Wukong
tips: Clever use of NIMBUS can help you cover long distances to start harvesting!

ski.name: GOLDEN STAFF
desc: Strikes in a straight line, dealing physical damage to enemy units and causing Stun for 0.75s, while granting 25% bonus movement speed for 3s. The closer enemy units are to the staff`s head, the more damage they take.
study: Unleashes at a target direction, stunning and dealing physical damage.

ski.name: MONKEY BUSINESS
desc: Summons an illusion of Sun Wukong with a portion of his attack damage for 10s, removing all negative debuffs. The illusion takes 200% damage and inherits Sun Wukong's passive ability and certain special effects from his gear.
study: Creates an illusion and removes all negative buffs.

ski.name: NIMBUS
desc: Rides a nimbus cloud and dashes at a target enemy unit, dealing physical damage to it and nearby enemy units. During the dash, the entire party is granted vision of the enemy unit for 5s. Cast the ability again to cancel the dash.
study: Charges at enemy target, dealing physical damage to it and nearby enemies.
update: Ability damage increased, and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: PIERCING EYE
desc: PASSIVE: Sun Wukong's basic attacks reduce the target enemy unit's Armor and Spell Resist for 5s, to a maximum of 4 stacks. Nimbus also causes a full stack of Pierce Eye when hitting its target enemy unit.
study: Reduces target`s Armor and Spell Resist.
update: Armor and Spell Resist reduction effect increased.

story: Sun Wukong was blessed with unmatched superhuman strength and the ability to transform into 72 different animals and objects. He could also magically manipulate wind, water and fire.

name: Minos
tips: The mere scent of an enemy hero causes Minos to see red.

ski.name: SWEEPING BLOW
desc: Minos invites his guests to a banquet they can not refuse. Swings a greataxe in a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units and drags them to Minos. Each enemy hero unit dragged grants a stack of bonus Armor and bonus Spell Resist for 4s.
study: Drags enemies from a target direction to Minos.

ski.name: FURIOUS ROAR
desc: A terrifying roar that deals magical damage to nearby enemy units and causes Movement Slow by 50%. Causes Fear instead to enemy units with less than 70% Health, which renders them unable to perform any actions.
study: Traps and deals magical damage to nearby enemies.

ski.name: VIOLENT ATTACK
desc: Minos leaps toward a target enemy hero unit, dealing massive physical damage while granting 25% bonus movement speed for 6s. Violent Attack can instantly kill an enemy hero unit with low Health, while healing Minos a portion of his Max Health.
study: Deals physical damage to a target hero, instant kills hero with low health.

ski.name: MIGHTY AXE
desc: Minos swings his enormous axe, dealing physical damage to nearby enemy units while causing Movement Slow by 25% for 2s.
study: Slows and deals physical to damage nearby enemies.

story: Legends of the minotaur chieftain Minos spread throughout the land. The peaceful minotaurs fought long and painstakingly against the humans. Time passed slowly as blood was spilled; but glory and valor lasts forever.

name: Fleur
tips: The combination of Gardener and Flower lets you romp over the battlefield.

ski.name: THORNY BLOOM
desc: Fleur summons an immobile thorny bloom to a target location, dealing fatal damage to nearby enemies for 20 seconds before disappearing. Cooldown is not affected by cooldown reduction gear. Plants take 250% damage from towers and deal one-off damage when spawning.
study: Places a thorny bloom to assist in attacks.

ski.name: LOVELY BLOOM
desc: Fleur summons an immobile lovely bloom to a target location, dealing slight damage to nearby enemies but reducing target movement speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Plant lingers for 20 seconds. Cooldown is not affected by cooldown reduction items. Plants take 250% damage from towers and deal slight one-off damage when spawning as well as causing Root. Enemy targets may only be rooted a maximum of once every 5 seconds.
study: Places a lovely bloom that deals damage and roots.

ski.name: FLOWER GARDEN
desc: Place a Flower Garden on a target point that deals magical damage to nearby enemy units and entangles them for 1 second. When placed, the garden sprouts 3 flowers to attack enemy units immediately. Each flower present grants a bonus to the Spell Power of Fleur.
data: Bonus Passive Spell Power per Flower: 6/8/10
study: Casting spawns attack flowers to support in combat.
update: Magical Damage and Bonus Spell Power increased.

ski.name: GARDENER
desc: PASSIVE: Thorny Blooms and Lovely Blooms restore Mana for Fleur. ACTIVE: blinks a short distance to another location. If a flower is present at blink destination, cooldown is reduced while triggering one-off damage and slowing movement for nearby enemies. Each flower may trigger effect once every 5 seconds.
study: Blinking to a flower location reduces ability cooldown.

story: Beauty was the most prized gift that the goddess of flowers gave her daughter. Using the most tender petals to fabricate her skin, she wondered if there was a better and more perfect way to create her daughter.

name: Murdoch
tips: Stay close to your weapon when you use Hammer Throw so you can cast the ability again even more quickly!

ski.name: HAMMER THROW
desc: Throws a mighty hammer in a target direction, dealing magical damage to nearby enemy units and causing Stun for 1s. If Murdoch retrieves his hammer within 2s, this ability's cooldown is reduced by 3s.
study: Deals damage to and stuns targets.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: ELECTROCUTE
desc: Draws thunderous energy from the center of a cyclone, granting 35% bonus movement speed. Murdoch can immediately perform a basic attack with on-hit magical damage, this effect lasts up to 6s. Cooldown begins when this effect ends.
study: Increases damage of next attack.

ski.name: Tenacity
desc: When Murdoch has less than 20% Health, removes control effects on him and grants him a shield equal to a certain percentage of his Max Health for 2.5 seconds.
study: Increases armor while reducing magical damage received.
update: Bonus Armor increased and magical damage reduced.

ski.name: LIGHTNING ARMOR
desc: Murdoch envelopes himself with an armor made of lightning, reflecting all incoming damage with magical damage. This effect can trigger up to 3 times per second, and debuffs attackers with Judgment, which causes Movement Slow.
data: Reflect Magical Damage: 15/30/45 +1% of Max Health
Reflect Damage Active: 30/60/90 +2% of Max Health
study: Counter-attacks while slowing down movement speed.
update: Counter-attack damage and slowdown effect increased.

story: Murdoch was the leader of the dwarves in the deep mountain. He trained up the people with hammer and shield to guard against the dark spirits threatening their lives. The never-ending tide of darkness continues into the distance, but the king of storm mountain is only just getting started.

name: Burninator
tips: Fel Bargain trades slow movement for huge power.

ski.name: HELLISH STOMP
desc: Leaps into the sky and smashes at a target area, dealing magical damage to enemy units and causing Stun for 0.75s. Burninator takes 0.75s to reassemble himself.
study: Deals magical damage to the target area and slows enemies.

ski.name: FIST OF HELL
desc: Casts at a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units in a rectangular area, causing Movement Slow for 3s.
study: Deals physical damage and slows enemies
update: Ability damage and movement slow effect increased.

ski.name: FEL BARGAIN
desc: ACTIVE: Burninator uses Fel Bargain to recover 6% of his max Health per second, while increasing the radius of Hellfire and granting 25% bonus movement speed._PASSIVE: Fel Bargain grants Burninator bonus Armor and bonus Spell Resist.
study: Significantly increases Health and Spell Resist.

ski.name: HELLFIRE
desc: PASSIVE: Hellfire envelopes Burninator, dealing magical damage plus bonus magical damage based on Burninator`s max Health to nearby enemy units.
study: Deals magical damage to nearby enemies.

story: An infant Burninator was reawakened and given unearthly powers. But before this transformation was complete, they would undergo brutal tribal combat. A deadlock persisted for years before one arrow pierced Skaaga's throat, and this blood gave Burninator his first taste of bitter pain and failure. Burninator was twisted by the ultimate rage and burned with a strange, impure glow of pure evil.

name: Fawna
tips: Using Camouflage triggers Survival Instincts directly.

ski.name: CAMOUFLAGE
desc: Become invisible, reducing your own Movement Speed by 30%. Attacking or the casting of skills will end invisibility, but the first Basic Attack performed within 5 seconds afterward will reduce target's DEF and deal additional physical damage. You can activate the skill again to end invisibility actively.
study: Invisible, DEF Debuff, DMG Bonus.
update: Magical Damage and buff effect increased.

ski.name: HIDDEN TRAP
desc: Call upon the power of nature to set a trap that activates and becomes invisible in 0.5 second, dealing physical damage to enemy unit(s) nearby and slowing down them. Fawna will deal 15% more damage to targets slowed down by the trap. Hidden Trap can withstand up to 3 physical attacks and up to 4 traps can exist concurrently, each lasting 120 seconds. Units triggering a trap become visible for 5 seconds.
study: Set traps that deal more damage to lured enemy units.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown decreased.

ski.name: POISONED ARROW
desc: Shoot a Poisoned Arrow at a target hero to deal poison damage in 3 seconds. The longer the duration, the greater the damage and more potent the effect.
data: For every 100 damage suffered, target takes additional 50/70/90 magical damage
study: Shoot a poisoned arrow at target.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown decreased.

ski.name: SURVIVAL INSTINCTS
desc: Fawna has remarkable survival instincts. When out of enemy sight, her Health Regen and Movement Speed increase.
study: Gain buffs when out of enemy vision.

story: Like the children of the jungle, known as â€œguardians of the greenâ€, they understand intimately how delicate Nature is, integrating with rather than relying on Nature. Fawna brings blessings to the forest. She cleanses the filth and returns it to the waters as rain; this is how rainforest came about. Legend has it that if you listen carefully enough in the rainforest, you can hear her laughter.

name: Vince
tips: Keep your distance from enemy heroes. Make sure you can attack them, but don`t let them attack you!

ski.name: MISSILE LAUNCHER
desc: Launches a missile at a target enemy unit, dealing physical damage. If the target enemy unit is hit by a missile again within 8s, deal bonus physical damage and cause Movement Slow by 30% for 2s.
study: Deals magical damage and causes Stun.

ski.name: ROCKET LAUNCHER
desc: Launches a rocket at a target direction, dealing magical damage to the first enemy unit it hits and causing Stun for 1s. Also causes 500 knockback to Vince.
study: Launches rockets in a target direction, dealing magic damage and causing stun. Knocks back Vince

ski.name: SPEED GLIDER
desc: Grants Vince bonus movement speed, 350 bonus vision radius and 350 bonus attack range, while granting 350 bonus travel distance to Missile Launcher.
study: Increases field of vision, attack range and movement speed.

ski.name: INCREASED FIREPOWER (PASSIVE)
desc: Vince shows off his firepower, his next basic attack deals an extra basic attack to the target enemy unit at 50% physical damage. Not affected by cooldown reduction.
study: Deals one extra bonus attack.

story: Firmly believing that "The one who masters the genetic code will become God", Vince founded the Black Basement at the Academy of Dark Arts and built an aircraft that could transcend the gap between the light and dark worlds to explore the universe.

name: Zed
tips: Use passive and ultimate ability wisely to deal more damage.

ski.name: INFECTIOUS LIGHTNING
desc: Zed shoots dark lightning in a target direction, dealing magical damage to the first enemy unit. The lightning then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing magical damage. Can only bounce once per enemy unit.
study: Shoots dark lightning, dealing magical damage.

ski.name: LIGHTNING TOTEM
desc: Summons a lightning totem at a target area, causing Movement Slow. The totem detonates after 0.75s, dealing magical damage and causing Stun.
study: Deals magical damage and causes Movement Slow.
update: Magical Damage and Movement Slow increased and Cooldown reduced.

ski.name: CALAMITY
desc: Creates a ball lightning at the target area that slowly moves forward after 2s, dealing continuous magical damage to enemy units and causing Movement Slow. Zed`s abilities deal bonus magical damage to enemy units based on their current Health. The ball lightning lasts 5s and the magical damage and bonus magical damage are doubled in its center.
study: Deals continuous magical damage, other abilities deal bonus damage.

ski.name: DARK SURGE
desc: The dark energy inside of Zed is incredibly unstable. Every 4 ability casts, lightning courses through Zed`s body for 5s, increasing movement speed while reducing all ability cooldowns and granting a damage bonus to basic attacks and abilities.
study: Gains a buff that increases movement speed and damage dealt.
