story: The curse of death changed Zed's pure, dark blood: his dexterous feet became hooves as heavy as power and plunder; his ears became horns of deceit; and his hands became discordant, killing claws. The man reborn from the embers of disaster is no longer a noble night elf. What appears instead is a demon, the emblem of chaos and murder.

name: Lunaria
tips: Don`t forget to detonate Luna Seed.

ski.name: MOONFLOWER
desc: Plants a Moonflower at a target area, causing Movement Slow to nearby enemy units. The Moonflower explodes after 0.5s, dealing magical damage to nearby enemy units and causes Movement Slow for 2.5s.
study: Slows and deals magical damage to enemies in the affected area.
update: Ability damage and slowing effect increased.

ski.name: MOON FORCE
desc: Uses the power of the illusory moon to cause Rabbit Form to the target enemy hero unit, dealing magical damage and causes Mana Drain. Rabbit Form causes the enemy hero unit to move slowly and prevents the usage of basic attacks and abilities.
study: Causes Rabbit Form, dealing magical damage and causes Mana Drain.
update: Ability damage and Mana drain increased.

ski.name: SONG OF THE MOON
desc: Lunaria channels for a short while and fires a powerful moon beam at a target direction, dealing massive magical damage to enemy units along its path.
study: Deals massive magical damage at a target direction.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: FLORAL ECLIPSE
desc: PASSIVE: Whenever Lunaria deals damage to an enemy unit with an ability, she debuffs them with Floral Eclipse for 6s. Lunaria`s basic attacks and abilities against these enemy units consume Floral Eclipse, which deals bonus magical damage.
study: Deals bonus magical damage to the target.

story: Lunaria used to be a mortal girl, but she had the elixir by mistake and lived on the moon with Lapina ever after.

name: Magnolia
tips: Gank foes with Qinggong when they are unaware!

ski.name: QINGGONG
desc: ACTIVE: Grants a massive amount of bonus movement speed and 40% Damage Reduction, as well as Hyper Armor which renders Magnolia immune to disables. While Magnolia is moving, she deals continuous magical damage to nearby enemy units and causes Movement Slow by 30% for 1s. This effect ends when Magnolia performs a basic attack or casts Jade Sword.
study: Greatly increases movement speed and deals magical damage to nearby enemies over time.

ski.name: JADE SWORD
desc: With an elegant flourish, deals physical damage to the target enemy unit and causes Movement Slow by 50% for 2s. The extra attack from Ambidextrous will cause Stun for 1s.
study: Deals physical damage to a target and causes Stun.

ski.name: SECRETS OF WUGONG
desc: Magnolia creates a cursed zone, granting bonus attack speed, bonus critical chance, and 25% Damage Reduction while inside the zone. The zone deals physical damage to enemy units inside the area, and deals physical damage to enemy units upon collision with the zone`s boundary, causing Movement Slow for 2.5s. Magnolia cannot be targeted during the cast animation.
study: Damages units in a target area while boosting Magnolia's stats.
update: Bonus damage and critical chance increased.

ski.name: AMBIDEXTROUS
desc: Grants basic attacks and Jade Sword a chance to score an extra attack.
study: Passively increases chance of bonus attack.

story: Magnolia is good at controlling bees, music and sewing. She combines music with the martial art and can communicate with people by music. She is as pure as jade with stunning grace in every move.

name: Athena
tips: Use spears on the ground to dash multiple times within a short period.

ski.name: SPEAR OF HARMONY
desc: ACTIVE: Athena summons a divine spear with her will, dealing magical damage to the target area and causing Disarm, which prevents the usage of basic attacks. The divine spear stays at the target point for 1s. PASSIVE: Every 5s, Athena`s next basic attack summons an extra divine spear, dealing bonus magical damage to the target enemy unit. The divine spear stays at the target point for 3s.
study: Summon spear, magical damage.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: RADIANT WINGS
desc: Athena spreads her wings and flies to the target point, dealing magical damage to nearby enemy units. If there were Divine Spears within the area, they are consumed and Radiant Wings deals bonus magical damage and refreshes its cooldown immediately.
study: Dash, magical damage.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: BURST OF KNOWLEDGE
desc: ACTIVE: Athena raises her staff, dealing magical damage to nearby enemy units, plus bonus magical damage based on the Intelligence difference between the enemy and Athena._PASSIVE: Grants bonus Intelligence to Athena.
study: Magical Damage, Passive Bonus Intelligence.
update: Magical Damage and Passive Intelligence increased.

ski.name: ATHENA'S JUDGMENT
desc: Athena channels and gathers divine light, dealing continuous magical damage and causing 20% Movement Slow. After 2s, the divine light transforms into a giant spear and impales the ground, dealing massive magical damage. Upon cast, Athena gains a shield for 2s which causes Athena to become immune to all disables.
study: =Massive area magical damage.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

story: Athena is the goddess of wisdom and war in ancient Greek mythology. As one of the twelve main gods in Olympus, she was radiant and graceful, and her wise deeds spread far and wide across the earth. She was widely known for her gold armor, spear and shield.

name: Paige
tips: Stack Agility to increase Paige`s overall damage output.

ski.name: BLADE OF FAITH
desc: ACTIVE: Unleashes a sword wave at a target direction, dealing physical damage plus bonus physical damage based on Agility to enemy units hit by it, and causes Root for 1.5s. Knight`s Pledge widens the sword wave and grants bonus Effect Range to Blade of Faith.
study: Physical Damage, Root.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: DEFENDER'S WINGS
desc: ACTIVE: Paige becomes Untouchable and unable to move or perform any actions for 1s. After the effect ends, all debuffs are cleansed, Paige heals Health, gains bonus movement speed and becomes immune to Disables for 3s.
study: Untouchable, Heals, Bonus Movement Speed.

ski.name: SWORD OF GLORY
desc: ACTIVE: Sword of Glory unleashes an enormous beam of divine light at a target direction, dealing massive physical damage plus bonus physical damage based on Agility to enemy units along its path. The divine beam consecrates the earth for 5s, dealing continuous physical damage to enemy units that step inside the zone.
data: Physical Damage Per Sec: 50/100/150 (+ 1% Target`s Max Health)
study: Massive physical damage in a straight line.
update: Magical Damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: KNIGHT's PLEDGE
desc: PASSIVE: Paige`s unwavering faith grants her bonus agility, bonus movement speed, and bonus Effect Range to Blade of Faith.
study: Bonus Agility, Movement Speed, and Effect Range to Blade of Faith.
update: Agility, Movement Speed and Effect Range increased.

story: Paige, the queen of Rothschild empire, sacrificed her faith to lift the curse of the sword in the stone, and with the sword, she lifted the realm's crown atop her head. However, Paige knew what she was missing. She put together crack knights to pursue what she had lost. They searched hard and far, throughout the farthest reaches of the realm.

name: Lotus
tips: Can be mage and assistant at the same time.

ski.name: SPRING BLOSSOMS
desc: Plays a song of Spring Blossoms, healing Lotus and up to 2 allied hero units within a 900 radius around her, while granting bonus physical damage on her next basic attack.
study: Increases damage of next attack while healing heroes.
update: Bonus damage and healing effect increased.

ski.name: WALTZ OF THE LARK
desc: Plays the Waltz of the Lark, dealing magical damage to 5 random enemy units within a 900 radius around Lotus, while granting 80 bonus movement speed to her and up to 2 allied hero units within a 900 radius. Lotus' next basic attack causes Movement Slow for 3s.
study: Deals damage to a target area while slowing movement speed.
update: Ability Damage and movement slow effect increased.

ski.name: PHOENIX RISING
desc: Lotus plays Phoenix Rising for 2.5s, becoming Untouchable and unable to move, while causes continuous Movement Slow by 35% to nearby enemy units. When Phoenix Rising ends, deals magical damage to nearby enemy units and causes Stun for 0.5s.
study: Slows nearby enemies, then stuns and deals magical damage.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: MYSTICAL MELODY
desc: Plays a Mystical Melody, dealing magical damage to a target enemy unit, and causing Confusion for 1s.
study: Deals damage to a target, causing Confusion.

story: Lotus was born beauty and gentle. After Wu army conquered her city, she went to Wu County and got married with Pyrrhus. This marriage was finally passed down as a much-told story.

name: Caesar
tips: Caesar is a real jungle killer whose movement speed contributes to damage.

ski.name: Eternal Sword
desc: Caesar wields his sword, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies. The higher the bonus Movement Speed, the higher the damage. Hitting an enemy hero or monster grants 1 stack(s) of Eternal Energy for 6s. Each time Caesar casts Eternal Sword while the Eternal Energy is active reduces the cooldown on this ability by 1s per stack, up to 2 stacks. This ability deals additional 75% damage against monsters and will not be affected by cooldown-reduction effects.
data: Bonus Damage Every 10 Bonus Movement Speed: 5
study: AoE Damage

ski.name: Lion Charge
desc: White lion Theuth charges in a target direction, seizing up to two enemies in its path. All targets hit by Theuth during the charge will suffer damage and 30% Movement Slow for 4s.
study: Charges and causes crowd control.

ski.name: Chariot Rush
desc: Caesar unleashes powerful chariots that crash through enemies and deal high magic damage. Each unit on impact suffers full damage at the first time, and then half damage in subsequent crashes. Allied heroes in the area of effect gain bonus Movement Speed for the duration.
study: High AoE Damage

ski.name: Lion Roar
desc:
White lion Theuth roars angrily, enhancing allied units' Armor and Movement Speed for 5s and granting an extra 50% of such bonus Armor and Movement Speed effect to Caesar.
Passive: There is no limit on Caesar's Movement Speed.
study: Grants team buffs.

story:
"I will conquer the land I see with my lifelong power; I come, I see and I conquer!"
The emperor said so. He took up the Eternal Sword and the people acknowledged allegiance to him where his sword pointed at â€“ This was Caesar, the most beloved son of the gods. The elegant and sacred white lion Theuth came to our emperor from the mountain of gods. It brought the holy shrine from the gods: only the great emperor was the real king in this world! No one could stop the army led by him. The resolution that he made led us to the top of glory.
He was the strongest warrior. He set the eternal cornerstone for the sacred Roman Empire. When everything was over, he gave up his honor as a great emperor.
He and the sacred beast Theuth left quietly under sacred sunglow. The mountain of god was his upcoming destination. He would be the god who always covered Rome with divine light â€“ the king of eternity, the great emperor Caesar, Julius!

name: Gideon
tips: Less health means more power for this character.

ski.name: SHIELD BREAKER
desc: Gideon concentrates power into his hammers, causing his next basic attack to reduce target enemy unit's Armor for 5s.
study: Next attack reduces the target`s armor.

ski.name: DOUBLE CUDGEL
desc: PASSIVE: Gideon's hammers grant bonus attack damage._ACTIVE: Throws a hammer at a target enemy unit, dealing physical damage and causing Movement Slow. Gideon can throw his other hammer after 2s.
study: Passively grants Damage and slows enemy unit.

ski.name: DOMINATION
desc: ACTIVE: Gideon becomes immune to magical damage and disables for 5s, while gaining 20% bonus movement speed._PASSIVE: Every 3s, Gideon's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage.
study: Become immune to spells, attacks can deal bonus damage.
update: Bonus damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: INDOMITABLE WILL
desc: PASSIVE: Gideon's injuries bolsters his fighting spirit, granting him bonus attack damage, bonus Armor, and bonus Spell Resist based on missing Health.
study: Taking damage increases attack power, armor and spell resist.
update: Bonus armor, spell resist, and damage increased.

story: Gideon had great strength and superb fighting skills. Wielding two hammers, he used to defeat an army alone and gained the name of 'The First Fighter in World'.

name: Nezha
tips: If you fail to revive, maybe you have no mana.

ski.name: EARTHEN CHAKRAM
desc: Hurls an earthen wheel that can bounce up to 5 times between enemy units, dealing physical damage and causing Movement Slow by 30% for 2s.
study: Silence and deals physical damage to multiple enemy units

ski.name: WHEELS OF AIR
desc: Dashes at a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along her path.
study: Charges toward a target direction and damages all enemies hit.

ski.name: GLORIOUS STOMP
desc: Leaps into the sky and stomps the target area, dealing physical damage to enemy units and causing knockup. For 3s, Nezha gains 30% Damage Reduction and deals bonus physical damage on her next basic attack.
study: Knocks up and deals damage to enemy units within range.
update: Ability damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: FIERY SPEAR
desc: PASSIVE: Each time Nezha casts an ability, her next basic attack within 5s deals bonus physical damage and heals Health.
study: Grants bonus damage to next attack and recovers Health.
update: Increased ability damage and Health recovered.

story: Nazha, a reincarnated spirit bead, was endowed with a special talent. He sacrificed his own life to save people in his town. Fortunately, his master remolded his body with lotus root and gave him some precious weapons. With respect to his effort in crusading against the tyrant, he finally became the immortal.

name: Odin
tips: Behead your enemies with Godly Sword!

ski.name: ICE BARB
desc: PASSIVE: Odin imbues his weapon with hoarfrost. After every 2 basic attacks, basic attack #3 deals bonus physical damage to the target enemy unit, causing Frozen for 1s and healing Odin. Odin cannot cause Frozen to the same enemy unit within 6s, and healing effects are halved against troops and jungle creatures.
study: Grants on-hit effects to basic attack.

ski.name: FIERY SHIELD
desc: Deals physical damage to enemy units within a 800 radius while granting Odin bonus Armor and bonus Magic Resist for 5s. The more enemy units hit, the more bonus Armor and bonus Magic Resist.
data: Bonus Magic Resist: 6/7/8/9 per Enemy Unit
study: Deals physical damage to the area while granting Armor and Magic Resist.
update: Increased physical damage, Armor and Magic Resist.

ski.name: HEROIC RUSH
desc: Odin dashes in a target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemy units along his path. The dash ends on the first enemy hero unit it hits, granting Odin bonus Movement Speed and bonus Attack Speed for 4s.
study: Dashes in a target direction, deals physical damage along the path.
update: Increased physical damage and reduced cooldown.

ski.name: GODLY SWORD
desc: Odin summons his Godly Sword to strike the land, dealing massive physical damage to target enemy unit, and deals physical damage to nearby enemy units based on the target enemy unit`s missing Health.
data: For every 3/2.5/2 points of the target`s missing Health, deal 1 physical damage to enemy units within a 350 radius, to a maximum of 1500 physical damage.
study: Massive damage to target, bonus damage to nearby enemy units.
update: Ability damage increased and reduced cooldown.

story: In Valhalla, the home of fallen heroes, Odin will lead his warriors into final combat. As night falls, Odin, wearing his Hawk Helm of supremacy, let out a mighty roar as he led out his godly forces. This is the nightfall of the gods. May countless years of enmity be settled on this night.

name: Pyrrhus
tips: Cast Enflame to divide and conquer, seizing control of the battlefield.

ski.name: BALL OF FIRE
desc: Pyrrhus draws upon his arcane knowledge to coalesce a gigantic fireball that slowly rolls in a target direction, dealing continuous magical damage to enemy units along its path.
study: Summons a fireball to deal magical damage:.

ski.name: BANISHMENT
desc: Debuffs an enemy hero unit with Banishment, which causes Movement Slow by 50% and disables its basic attacks. Banishment also causes the enemy hero unit to take 33% less physical damage, and 33% more magical damage.
study: Banishes enemy heroes within a target area.

ski.name: ENFLAME
desc: Pyrrhus drops fiery columns at a target area, setting the battlefield ablaze for {1}s, dealing continuous magical damage to enemy units inside the area and causing Movement Slow.
study: Slows and Deals massive magical damage to enemies in a target area.
update: Ability damage damage increased and cooldown reduced.

ski.name: MAGIC CONVERSION
desc: ACTIVE: Basic attacks cost mana and deal on-hit magical damage.
study: Imbues basic attacks with bonus magical damage.

story: Pyrrhus, a hero even in youth, intelligent, combative, musical, like an unblemished piece of jade. When young, he swore an oath to help the emperor rule. His love with Lotus is also beautiful and touching.

name: Estrath
tips: Use disabling abilities to penetrate enemy lines like an arrow piercing silk

ski.name: ICY TORNADO
desc: Estrath unleashes a sword beam in a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along its path and causing Movement Slow by 70% for 1s. Against enemy units with 4 Hyperthermia notches, Icy Tornado causes Stun for 1s instead. Estrath gains bonus movement speed for 3s if Icy Tornado hits an enemy unit.
study: Slashes in a target direction, dealing damage and stunning enemies.
update: Grants bonus physical damage and movement speed.

ski.name: WINDS OF FROST
desc: Estrath raises his sword and dashes in a target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemy units along his path. Cast again within 5s to perform another dash, and if both dashes hit enemy units, Estrath gains bonus Attack Speed for 4s.
study: Dashes towards a target direction, May be cast again for a second dash.

ski.name: HYPOTHERMIA
desc: PASSIVE: Being an expert in swordsmanship, each basic attack or ability cast leaves a notch on enemy units that can stack up to 4 times. Estrath deals bonus physical damage to these enemy units. At 4 notches, deals a burst of magical damage equal to 12% of their missing Health. A notch lasts 5s.
study: Grants bonus damage to basic attacks.

ski.name: KISS OF THE WIND
desc: Estrath dashes to the target area and causes Airborne to enemy units inside, performing 4 basic attacks in quick succession. Estrath cannot be attacked while Airborne.
study: Unleashes a wave of attacks in a target area.

story: The legendary swordsman was ruthless and constantly challenged the masters of the martial art in order to pursue his own kendo. In the process of the constant challenges, his sword skills became more and more powerful. Finally, he disappeared and went to an unknown place to continue his practice.

name: Celestius
tips: Use Astral Defense for a surprising effect.

ski.name: ASTRAL FIRE
desc: Heavenly King summons forth an astral fire from beneath the ground, dealing Magical Damage to enemy units in target area and Rooting for 0.3 seconds.
study: Magical Damage, Stun.

ski.name: ASTRAL STEP
desc: Heavenly King steps through the astral plain, instantly blinking to a target location. Blink deals damage to surrounding area at both points of travel.
study: Dashes and deals Damage.

ski.name: DRAGON FAMILIAR
desc: Passive: coils an almighty dragon around Heavenly King when fully charged, dealing continuous damage to surrounding enemy units._Active: surges dragon at a target location, dealing damage to enemy units along the way and continually draining Mana. Deals continuous damage to tangled enemy units, acquiring field of vision. Re-cast ability to send dragon soaring, dealing damage. Unaffected by cooldown reduction items.
study: Passive: deals continuous damage. Active: deals high damage.

ski.name: ASTRAL DEFENSE
desc: Passive: each ability cast generates 1 shield layer that increases Heavenly Kingâ€™ Spell Power and Spell Resist, up to 3 stacks. Active: Heavenly King expends his energy shields in a single burst, dealing explosive damage to surrounding enemy units. The more shield layers active, the higher the damage dealt.
study: Gains shields which deal damage when detonated.
update: Magical Damage and buff effect increased.

story: It's said, at the very top of the Heaven lies a splendid palace, where Celestius, Emperor of the Gods, rules over the realms of the universe. He used to be a prince. After ten thousand calamities, he ascended. But still, the calamities came by the thousands, then the millions, until Celestius ultimately attained enlightenment.

name: Dragos
tips: Dragos is able to switch states, quickly adapting to conditions of battle.

ski.name: DRACONIC ROAR
desc: A terrorizing roar that deals physical damage to a nearby enemy unit and causes Stun. While in Dragonform, the cast range is increased to 800.
study: Stuns the target and deals physical damage.

ski.name: DRAGON BREATH
desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in a rectangular area in front of Dragos, dealing magical damage to enemy units.
study: Deals magical damage at a target direction.

ski.name: BLOOD OF THE DRAGON
desc: PASSIVE: Awakens the blood of dragons inside Dragos._Fire Dragon Blood: Grants bonus attack damage and bonus Mana Regen. Ice Dragon Blood: Grants bonus Armor and bonus Health Regen.
study: Change forms for different effects.

ski.name: DRAGONFORM
desc: Dragos enters his Dragonform for 25s, gaining bonus movement speed while increasing his basic attack range to 850. Dragos`s basic attacks hit an area around the target enemy unit, and apply on-hit effects from Dragonform. Fire Dragonform: Basic attacks have a bonus critical chance._Ice Dragonform: Basic attacks cause Movement Slow for 3s.
study: Turns into a dragon form with ranged attacks that have special effects.
update: Critical chance and slow effect increased.

story: Out of the fear of the power in his blood, Dragos roamed the wastelands, surviving on blood to fuel his arcane energies. Luckily, he gradually learned to control over his monstrous appetites. Now fully grown, this wandering knight yearns to return to his birthplace. On that day, the kingdom earned another legend: the legend of Dragos!

name: Khaos
tips: Deals massive magic damage through the combination of abilities and passive effects.

ski.name: Flames of Chaos
desc: Khaos conjures a lava fountain out of flames in the target area, dealing massive magic damage and applying Mindburn. Enemies in the center are knocked up into the air and suffer more damage.
study: Deals high AoE damage.

ski.name: Prison Panic
desc: Emits a shockwave in a random direction. If it hits an enemy hero, builds a prison with the enemy hero as center and causes Slow. After 1.5s, the enemy failing to escape prison will be dragged to the center for the second stage of damage and suffers Mindburn.
study: Provides crowd control.

ski.name: Infinite Scorch
desc: Creates a wide scorch zone in which enemies are burned and slowed continuously. When first entering the scorch zone, Khaos is surrounded by flame and receives a shield that blocks damage and will disappear if Khaos leaves the scorch zone more than 5s. Khaos also gains a constant stream of flame energy from the scorch zone and slow regeneration of Shield while in the scorch zone._Enemies who stay in the scorch zone more than 3s will suffer Mindburn.
study: Area Buff

ski.name: Mindburn Impact
desc:
Passive (Inherent): Some of Khaos' abilities may throw enemies into the Mindburn state that drains part of their Armor and Magic Resist. Khaos' basic attacks against enemies in Mindburn deals bonus damage and heals himself.
Active: Charges at enemies in a target direction to burn their mind, dealing damage to the enemies hit. (Mindburn Impact can trigger the bonus effect of Mindburn directly.)
study: Dash & Damage

story:
The eternal conflict between Heaven and Hell can be traced back to ancient times before human ancestors appeared. Through endless battles, the prophecy about the birth of the forbidden was spread around the world.
He would become King of Evernight and also Son of Holiness, declaring his mission to end the eternal conflict. It was also firmly believed that his birth would bring doom upon Heaven and Hell.
Unexpectedly, his birth was not a result of forbidden love across races but an extremely bloody battle. When a thousand angels fell and a thousand demons were destroyed, a human with angelic face and demonic body spread his enormous wings. The moment he appeared, a new world was formed out of chaos. Khaos, the pure primal god that contains the power of darkness and light, called himself the source of chaos and created humans.
Humans flourished on the continent, but went to Heaven or Hell after death. Khaos got nothing in return and realized his power was stolen. Then, he rallied a massive human troop and initiated a battle against Heaven and Hell. Khaos was unstoppable and so close to the victory, but a human's betrayal at the critical moment made him sealed by Heaven and Hell together.
Thousands of years after Khaos' failure, he broke the seal and returned to the world of mortals. With a wicked smile on his face, Khaos swore to reclaim his world and take back the control on the destiny of mortals.

As she left, the entire kingdom was plunged into a frosty winter, freezing solid behind her. It's not the end. She will one day return to restore her kingdom; to claim her rightful throne!

Aim! Shoot! Miraculously, the speeding suns were struck and gradually fell, one after the other. As the ninth sun fell, peace was restored. Legends were told of this 'Sun Archer'.

story: Aiden was different from other elves. He was swift and his great passion for adventure could light up the whole Dark Woods. When the disturbing news that the Dark King had regained consciousness befell the forest, Aiden's pleas for battle were granted this time, and he teamed up with the other species on this almighty quest. When the source of all evil was cast into the lava, everything was worth it.

Recognized for his mighty magic and contributions, he was conferred a white wizard's robe. So long as danger strikes, he'll be ready to return once more to carry out justice!

With the gaze of a leopard and the roar of a tiger, his serpent spear fixed in hand, every detail supported his courageous attitude. Not to mention his legendary drinking prowess and many heroic deeds.

name: Titan
tips: Earthen Shield reduces the time of Paralysis debuff.

ski.name: SHOCKHAMMER
desc: Titan wields his almighty hammer, dealing damage and slowing Movement Speed to enemies in the area. Titan is paralyzed for a brief moment after throwing the hammer. Hitting a target reduces the cooldown on Sudden Attack by 50%.
study: Deals physical damage and reduces movement speed

ski.name: SUDDEN ATTACK
desc: Titan charges in a target direction, dealing damage and gaining an Earthen Shield. Enemies hit by this stop and slow down. Using this ability after Shockhammer removes Paralysis debuff.
study: Charges, dealing damage and gaining a shield.

ski.name: TITANIC ANGER
desc: Titan's rage soars. Upon activation, enemy movement is slowed by 30%, which continues for 3 seconds after leaving the area of effect. Thereafter, Titan accumulates rage for up to 2 seconds, with a 1-second buffer. Re-casting or interrupting causes Titan to slam his hammer into the ground, dealing physical damage to an area and causing Stun for 0.5 to 1.5 seconds depending on the duration of rage charge-up. Titan is immune to Stun during charge-up period.
study: Cause damage and stun after charge-up.

ski.name: EARTHEN SHIELD
desc: Grants Titan a shield to block damage. Titan's next attack Roots a target, dealing bonus physical damage. Casting Shockhammer while Earthen Shield is erected prevents Paralysis debuff.
study: Grants a shield that imbues the next attack with Root, causing extra damage.

story:
The depths of his memory were covered with occult haze and could never be removed. The prophet told his ominous future at the time of his birth â€“ he and his brothers would kill their father, got bad repute and became the enemies of all people in the most tragic manner. This curse ran throughout his life like a haunting shadow. The father never hid his abomination of them and even wanted to get rid of them soon, but the mother hid them in the name of the earth. His childhood memories were all about hiding from place to place and surviving humbly.
Titan wielded the heavy hammer in his hands, trying to expel the memories out of his mind. His father, the Great God Uranus, stood high in the sky and overlooked at him arrogantly. However, this reunion was not worth celebrating. He would rather cut off the disgusting relationship with his great father than carrying curses, living humbly and bearing baseless charges. The air was filled with smoke and blood. The disparity in power failed to break Titan's fighting spirit. His body got as dilapidated as the land under him, but he would never yield as long as he was able to fight again! Titan stood up again and again, keeping his body upright. He would never be defeated unless his head was cut off!
Prophecy was finally realized in a horrifying way, but Titan laughed loudly.
"Come on!" he muttered. "I have seized my fate! I am fearless!"

Romanians see Nosferatu as a national hero, although most see him as a fictional bloodthirsty monster.

The common people starved and froze no more, thanks to the help of Una.

desc: Human Form: After hitting an enemy hero, casts a spider web to trap all enemy heroes nearby and deal damage. The target trapped cannot escape from the web. Spider Form: Runs at the target hero to cause damage and slowdown, adding a mark to the target. The target will suffer true damage 3 seconds later based on the damage taken from Nina for the duration.
study: Controls an area and deal damage to a single target.

story:
The coup against Empress Nina broke out on one night. The aristocrats who were once been forgiven rushed into the palace with soldiers. "Catch Nina!" Raging flame plagued the palace and illuminated cold corpses over the ground. "Kill her. She is not worthy of empress!"
Targeted rebel army stroke all the way into her resting palace and Nina had to flee to the north side of the royal city with her guards. Beyond the north side was the dreadful Forbidden Forest. Rebel army would not be there. However, the gap between the strength of the two sides was too wide. When they arrived at the Forbidden Forest, all her guards had died in battle, leaving the desperate Nina alone encircled by her enemies.
The aristocrats sneered at her contemptuously, "Do you want to surrender or escape into the land of death?"
The face of the empress got pale because of fear, but she still looked up and walked into the forest with dignity, "I swear with my soul that I will come back! Kill all of you!"
The rebel army looked toward the dark forest riotously and wanted to confirm whether the empress was dead. Nina went into the depths of the thick forest and her feet got tied by cold sticky strings. The feeling of numbness spread from her limbs and violent chelicerae spread all over her body, harvesting her life little by little. The soul that was once arrogant fell into hell and death was coming. Nina shed tears desperately.
"I can't die..." The anger of revenge rushed into her heart. The hatred of being betrayed and the pain of being gnawed made her yell hoarsely from the depths of her soul, "I must not die!"
"Do you want to revenge those people who had betrayed you?" A sweet and tempting voice echoed near her ears suddenly. Nina replied resolutely, "I want them to die in fear and pain!"
Darkness came from darker places. A huge human-faced tarantula emerged from the depths of a cave, watching the blurred vision of the severely injured empress and revealing a twisted and greedy smile.
"I like your hatred. I will give you the power that you desire if you knee under my feet!" A few days later, the message that the empress re-ascended the throne shocked the whole kingdom. Civilians who loved Nina cheered and celebrated. Nobody knew that corpses wrapped by spidersâ€™ threads one by one were hung upside down from the dome of a large hall in the distant palace. The empress looked up coldly and the tarantula's minions were squatting behind her.

story:
One person wouldn't associate the name Zoe Claison with the Pathless Phantom no matter how imaginative the person was. Judging by appearance, Zoe Claison was only a fresh intern reporter carrying a little bear backpack and tracking all kinds of boring archaeological news all day long. In fact, however, Zoe Claison was an excellent treasure hunter and inborn adventurer. She had discovered or published countless archaeological sites.
Under the cover of her reporter identity, she was able to travel more conveniently throughout the remains all over the world. In addition to acquiring treasures, she also had an ultimate goal: to find the remains of the Sacred Altar leading to the otherworld.
One day, Zoe received a new mission â€“ a scientific expedition team had found a secret chamber guarded by two giant statues in the Mayan Pyramids amidst the American jungle and inside the secret chamber were reliefs decorated with the pattern of altar. "This must be related to the remains of the Sacred Altar!" Zoe got excited and hurriedly boarded one plane to the camp. She didn't bother herself to change her clothes and equipment.
By virtue of the press card and vibrant smiles, she passed interrogation and examination easily, and then entered the scientific expedition camp. She secretly sneaked into the secret chamber at night after everyone fell asleep. When the chamber door was opened, moonlight fell onto the reliefs. A projection of the Sacred Altar with flickering blue light suddenly appeared in the chamber. Having noticed this sudden change, Zoe couldn't wait to take out her camera. But the moment she pressed down the shutter, the magical energy in the chamber began to boom and swallowed her in an instant.
After waking up, Zoe found herself in a completely strange world: extremely beautiful and changeable sky colors, towering trees, and all kinds of strange creatures that she had never seen before.... And at the same time, the camera in her hand also had incredible changes and gained amazing magical energy.
Looking at this unknown and dangerous world, Zoe stepped forward unhesitatingly because she realized that this adventure would be more interesting than ever before.

tips: Ensure Glee Puck's survival while casting multiple sets of abilities by making use of Clefairy's moves.

Rolling Charge: Commands Clefairy to roll towards the target direction, causing damage, knockup and Movement Slow against enemy units along the path. The rolling distance increases with the channel time. Clefairy has its Health restored continuously while channeling and becomes immune to controls while casting this ability. However, Clefairy's casting of this ability will be interrupted when Glee Puck is suffering from some control effects like Stun.

When Clefairy is summoned, Clefairy runs at the enemy units marked to launch attacks. Clefairy's attacks will smash the mark, causing additional damage and Root.
study: Marks enemies and deals damage. Clefairy runs at the targets marked.

ski.name: Natural Flavor
desc: Active: Clefairy dashes towards the target direction and then splashes concentrated leaf juice around. Teammates taking the juice will get healed and reduce the damage received, while enemies touching the juice will be slowed. After casting this ability, Clefairy can dash and splash the juice once again within 3 seconds. The damage reduction and slow effects will last for 2 seconds when out of range. Passive: Clefairy's third basic attack deals additional magic damage to the target, granting bonus Health Regen to Glee Puck and allied units around Clefairy.
study: Grants buffs or causes Movement Slow in an area.

ski.name: Soul Bond
desc: Soul Bond 1: Glee Puck summons Clefairy to fight side by side. Clefairy shares the Armor/Magic Resist/Health Regen & Health that Glee Puck receives from her equipment. Soul Bond 2: Calls Clefairy back to Glee Puck when it goes too far away. Passive: Clefairy and Glee Puck are bound by each other's soul. When the distance between Glee Puck and Clefairy is less than 600 and Clefairy takes no damage from enemy heroes or towers within 5 seconds, Clefairy gains bonus Health Regen. If Glee Puck is killed, Clefairy will flow into a rage with both the Attack Speed and Movement Speed increased. When the rage ends, Clefairy disappears.
data: Health Regen (Passive): 3%/4%/5%/6% of Clefairy's Max Health per second
study: Summons Clefairy or calls Clefairy back.

story:
Most living creatures had to undergo the passage of time, but Glee Puck didn't fall into this category. As the essence of all natural things, Glee Puck had a clean and pure heart, a shape that never grew up and wonderful ability to communicate with flowers and animals. Her name came from her mantra: glee.
After living alone in the nature for many years, she together with her little friend Clefairy came to a city-state of mankind out of the yearning for human world and desire for new friends. Glee Puck played with children and used magic to turn tables and chairs into flowers and animals temporarily for fun. But people didn't seem to appreciate her kindness. These adults quickly ordered their children to stay away from Glee Puck because of their fear of her magic and power.
Glee Puck felt sad and left that city-state, aiming to find another new world full of goodness and beauty. When passing through the Valley of War, Glee Puck and Clefairy encountered the fierce beast Gluttony which was about to devour the nearest human city-state. Despite being alienated by humans, they fought a battle against Gluttony resolutely in order to protect the lovely children from being hurt. However, Gluttony was so powerful that Glee Puck and Clefairy were in danger. At the critical moment, a man called "Fist" from a different world appeared suddenly. With his help, Gluttony was finally defeated and retreated.
Glee Puck developed strong interest in this man with a big dipper-shaped scar on his chest. In the face of this curious and innocent kiddy who raised questions one after another, Fist told her about his entire experience and his determination to sweep away all evilness and injustice. After listening to the narrative of Fist, Glee Puck felt the tremendous courage and the power of faith from his body. She realized that instead of looking for a visionary new world, it was better to create and guard all that she had at present. So she decided to become a partner of Fist and embarked on an unknown adventure together with him!
I won't be afraid! Glee!
â€“Glee Puck

Gains 1 stack every 6 seconds, up to 4 stacks.

When the seal drops on the ground, a huge army appears and Ying Zheng receives a shield. The terracotta warriors attack enemy units closest to them, especially enemy heroes. Each attack attaches a stack of Ghost Force. Ghost Force: 5% movement slow for 5 seconds per stack. At full stacks of 5, Ying Zheng's next ability attack stuns enemies for 1 second and deals additional damage. This effect takes effect on a target only once every 5 seconds.

Unique Elixir: Speeds up for 2s and heals Heath. Super Elixir: Grants a bonus movement speed for 3s, immunity to movement debuffs, and additional healing equal to 10% of his Max Health. This ability can be activated at any time.
study: Removes control effects and gives random buffs.

story:
Ying Zheng ate the fairy medicine brought back by Xu Fu on his east tour chariot at the age of forty-nine.
The medicine had no taste, but made him drowsy immediately.
Ying Zheng saw the three-year-old self in a small dim courtyard. The bustling sound of many children came from outside, but he never played with them. He needed to face his sullen father and frowning mother every day. He often wondered why the world was only as small as a courtyard and there were only so few people at home. But the young boy did not lose child's nature. He often threw things outside the courtyard. The children outside the courtyard began to notice his existence gradually. They threw back stones at him through an impenetrable wall.
As time passed, the young Ying Zheng could even hit the children with stones just by voice outside the wall. Ying Zheng saw the forty-five-year-old self in extremely grand E-Pang Palace. His world was no longer the small courtyard in Handan but the entire land of China. However, this did not end the uneasiness of his inner heart. Behind his majesty was endless anxiety and uneasiness. In the end, he gave up restraint and degraded from a gentle monarch that treated worthy men with courtesy into a Tyrant Satt: building the Great Wall, abusing the financial resources of the people and burning books and burying Confucian scholars alive. Restraint, the one who could restrain the first emperor in the world was only himself. He knew fate and was about to die soon, but he tried to override time. The only thing that he cared about was to extend his life through theurgy and alchemy.
At the moment that his consciousness finally dissipated in drowsiness, a voice full of vicissitudes asked him to make a choice between the two scenarios that he saw just now. There was a reason why Ying Zheng became the first emperor in the world. He answered hesitatingly:
I want all!
Then he finally conquered his last enemy: his dying life. He gained through theurgy the power comparable to Three Sovereigns and Five Emperors, resumed his childish appearance and came to a totally different world. Ying Zheng looked at that grotesque and gaudy new world. There was no suffocating courtyard or the fluttering flags of the great Qin Emperor.
How could this be!
He rode his own theurgy dragon chair and decided to take a good look at that world, and then swept the dukes in that world and incorporated the world into the territory of the great Qin Emperor. The world had a saying: Emperor Qin swept the world and watched over the world majestically; he waved his sword and cut off floating cloud, thus all the dukes/prince came westward to worship him. At this very moment, another small conqueror showed up in the world. Please show great respect when you come across him. Ying Zheng never showed mercy to those people who regard him as child. He would use ghost seal to smash them into pieces.

name: Sunmonk

Casting this ability also adds 1 Evil stack.

study: Deals damage or controls enemies based on the current nature.

Casting this ability again within 3 seconds teleports Sunmonk instantly. If Sunmonk is teleported to the target hero within a radius of 500, roots the target for 1.5 seconds.

Good Nature: Grants Sunmonk bonus Magic Resist based on his Good stacks. Evil Nature: Enhances Sunmonkâ€™s Evil Will with greater Magic Resist Reduction based on his Evil stacks.

Magic Resist Reduction of Evil Will Enhanced per Evil Stack: 0/2/3/4/5

story:
Do human beings have free will to choose between right and wrong? To find the truth, monks in the Sky Temple are dedicated to both mental and physical training. This ancient temple holds a lot of mysteries, including the peach tree that was over one hundred years old, but bearing neither leaves nor flowers. Everybody was talking about this weird tree, while the Elder of each generation persisted in taking care of it. In the warm spring, miracles happened. The tree prospered and bloomed insanely. Meanwhile, a baby was found crying on the peaches. The Elder came and took the baby without a word, leaving disciples astonished. Some people assured the baby was reincarnation of the Great Exorcist who sealed the Evil Lord a hundred years ago.
The rumor was only half true. The Great Exorcist has been reincarnated, but only his body. His spirit has vanished. The Elder knew it clearly that the birth of this baby also marked the return of the Evil Lord 20 years later. Before that, he must pass on all his knowledge to this baby.
At the age of eighteen, the peach boy was officially granted the Dharma name - Sunmonk - for his excellence in martial arts and Buddhism. At the same time, Sunmonk was told his past life as Great Exorcist and was destined to seal the Evil Lord by sacrificing himself again. He didn't say anything, but asked the Elder for a leave to travel for two years. After that, he would decide whether or not to fulfill his destiny. Great Exorcist has passed away, and he will live by his own decision as Sunmonk.

story:
In late Eastern Han Dynasty, the city of Wan fell in the control of the Kingdom of Wu. After spring passed by, fallen flowers were scattered all over the city and every place was desolate due to chaos caused by war. A group of soldiers led by two general-like men carried eight/nine large cases full of gold and silver and came to a residence in the eastern suburbs. After the cases were landed, the two men sit down. The leading man saluted to the residence owner and said happily, "I heard that Duke Qiao have two daughters who are all national beauties. Today Sun Ce comes for proposing marriage. What do you think, Duke Qiao?"
In the backyard boudoir, Naiad played the zither while listening to a servant reporting the affair that occurred in the front hall. Lotus, who was born pretty, had already become impatient. She hugged the arm of Naiad and swayed it gently, "Naiad, Naiad, do we two really have to marry the same husband..." "Sun Ce is handsome, but he is called the Bully of Jiangdong. I'm afraid that he is not gentle and romantic..." "Naiad, isn't it very interesting if the flute of General Pyrrhus can be matched with our zither..." Naiad patted on the hand of Lotus and said faintly, "Later you go to the hall together with me. You don't say anything. Just let me handle all things."
Sun Ce expressed his intention straightforward in the hall. Duke Qiao knew that he had no way out, but it was difficult for him to make a decision. He had been rushing around with his two daughters for decades in order to escape from the disaster of wars. He was not willing for his two daughters to get involved in wars, but they gradually demonstrated their extreme beauty and their prettiness was widely spread out, so they had to accept their destiny in the end. Noticing that Duke Qiao kept silent, Sun Ce got somewhat impatient. Pyrrhus saw this and opened his mouth. "Duke Qiao and your two daughters have been homeless for so many years. Isn't it a joyful thing if Duke Wu can become your son-in-law?"
"Pyrrhus hits the mark with a single comment. How do you know it's joyful? You seem to understand us two sisters better than Duke Wuâ€”" Someone said lightly. The voice sounded like a jade falling into an ice pool and even the splash of water was cold.
Sun Ce and Pyrrhus turned back and looked toward the hall parlor. The soldiers crowding the front hall dispersed unconsciously. Two women came over slowly, one in the front and the other one in the back. The woman who spoke just now walked in the front and raised her head slightly with her hair top-knotted and inserted with a phoenix-like spiral feather. She had tall figure and well-proportioned eyes. When she walked, the golden phoenix-like spiral feather and the pendent between her eyebrows wobbled rhythmically. Her clothing was elegant with winding cuffs from the ground and a long skirt tail dragged behind her body. She was as light as water but as noble as a phoenix. She overlooked at Pyrrhus like a monarch overlooked the whole world, "Why doesn't Pyrrhus propose marriage? Is it because that you look down upon Naiad and Lotus because of our Sinister Prisoner identity?"
Pyrrhus realized that what he said just now was impolite and was about to say something. But Naiad ignored him and turned over to Sun Ce and bowed slightly, "Duke Wu, I beg your forgiveness. My father feels awkward because he worries," Naiad pulled Lotus to her side. "We two sisters are always close with each other, but it's inevitable that we will gradually become alienated from each other if we serve the same husband. My father and we two sisters are not willing to see this." Having seen that Sun Ce seemed to be absorbed in thought, Naiad continued, "I heard that Duke Wu has always been kind to talented people and he treated Pyrrhus like his own brother. Duke Wu, you two people propose marriage together. Two talents match two beauties respectively. Both sisterhood and brotherhood are respected in this way. Isn't this a perfect idea?"
"Ha-ha, what a perfect idea! Ah, Pyrrhus, you have good luck today. Ehâ€”" Sun Ce looked at Naiad with great interest. "Would you marry me or your younger sister married me?" Naiad couldn't help smiling. Her smile agitated the heart of Sun Ce. "Duke Wu is joking. I never say that I'm the elder sister. Lotus thinks it's an ancient ritual to respect for seniority. As Duke Wu is elder than Pyrrhus, so Duke Wu should match with the elder sister and I match with Pyrrhus." Naiad then pushed Lotus to the side of Sun Ce gently. Sun Ce was in a hurry and yelled that this was improper. Lotus tittered and felt at ease after catching a glimpse of her elder sister. She knew that her elder sister would always protected her.
After marriage was nailed down, Sun Ce responded to the request of Naiad: treating the whole members of Qiao family well. Naiad then re-introduced herself the elder sister. Sun Ce was not angry or annoyed. He smiled and looked Naiad, thinking that he really could not see through this wife. A long time later, Sun Ce asked Naiad what she would do if he agreed with her matching proposal of respecting the seniority at that time.
"This shows that you are a person who abides by etiquette, then you mean what you say in terms of big issues. After you know the truth and find that I'm elder, then you will still marry me. You chose to follow your heart at that time." Naiad then looked back at Sun Ce with a smile, looking like a phoenix falling into the human world. The eyes of Sun Ce were blinkered. He really wanted to ask her, "What is really in her mind? Did she just want to help Lotus?" But he hesitated and didn't dare to open his mouth.

study: Restores Health and enhances normal attacks

story:
Come on, friends coming from afar, please come here, come to my home and sit for a while. I live in a despicable and utterly destitute cottage. Although I am also a fairy, I live in seclusion near the magic water, far away from the prosperous fairyland. I really don't have anything good to entertain you. Oops, you said that there must be something good in this food steamer? You really have flattered me, really... but I think you're sighted after all, so I seem to be mean if I continue to hide the truth from you.
Uh~ I have delicious scented glutinous rice dumplings, do you want to have a taste?
Wait! Let's come to an agreement at first. Don't spill the beans to other fairies of Penglai! If you let them know that this food steamer still exists in the world, then the peace scenario of Penglai will be destroyed at once... Don't laugh! Murry is a quite serious fairy otter! You eat your glutinous rice dumpling while let me talk with you so that you don't blame me for being mad.
At that time, human beings destructed the rite and music system and smashed gods, which made the Royal Emperor of the supreme heaven bristle with anger and bring a series of heavy disasters to the human world. Therefore, violent social upheavals occurred and people suffered from the chaos caused by war and famine. The Royal Emperor cooled down forty-nine days later. He stood on the edge of Jade Mirror Pool and had a look at the human world. He could not help gaining compassion for humans. As one day in Heaven was equal to one year in the human world, the human world underwent disasters and people were plunged into dire suffering for forty-nine years over the past forty-nine days in Heaven. The Royal Emperor stopped heavenly disasters and then summoned an otter from the Jade Mirror Pool and ordered him to go to the human world with a steamer called "Cloud Steamer" and cook meals for people to end their famine suffering.
After Murry came to the human world, it steamed rice with "Cloud Steamer" and added various ingredients. But it suddenly realized that there was no suitable container for distributing the food to people. Murry could not make people scoop and eat the food with a ladle around the "Cloud Steamer", could it? So Murry worked out a measure according to local conditions. It collected reed leaves by riverside and wrapped food with them for people to fill their stomach. Later generations named this kind of food as glutinous rice dumpling and the human custom of putting glutinous rice dumpling into water was not only commemoration but also gratitude to Heaven.
Yes, I am the otter and this is that "Cloud Steamer". The people who ate glutinous rice dumplings got a part of faint fairy power. If their offspring were the only children, these offspring would inherit the gathered fairy power from their parents. These only children were the ancestors of the gods of Penglai. Please must not let them know that this fairy artifact is under their noses before they pledge allegiance to the supreme heaven.... Hey, don't be so nervous, otherwise glutinous rice dumpling is not tasteful. Don't worry, I am a fairy who once skied water in the Jade Mirror Pool! I also had a very good theurgy!

name: Di Renjie
tips: Justice Blade can trigger equipment effect. Use it wisely to make you stronger.

ski.name: HERO'S PATH
desc: When sneaking towards a target direction, Di Renjie enters an invisible state and moves faster. Both his attack speed and movement speed will be increases when the invisible status ends.
study: Be invisible when move; Attack Speed and Movement Speed are increased when not invisible.

ski.name: INSIGHT
desc: Di Renjie marks an enemy immediately. During the following 6 sec, the marked enemy cannot dodge normal attacks and Di Renjie has the enemy's view without consuming the mark. Meanwhile, repeatedly triggers additional passive damage and slows the enemy's speed. Passive: Di Renjie knows the enemy and increases critical chance permanently._Di Renjie marks an enemy unit periodically. After hitting the enemy 3 times by attack or skill, the mark will disappear, causing extra damage and slowdown effect.
study: Increases Critical Chance and mark enemy target

ski.name: JUDGEMENT WHEEL
desc: Di Renjie throws out a wheel. When colliding with enemy hero or reaching the maximum range, the wheel spreads out blades to cause a large amount of physical damage and slowdown effect. The wheel returns to Di Renjie when reactivated or reaching the range limit.
data: Physical Damage Dealt by Whirling Blade Every 0.5s: 80/100/120
study: Deals damage and causes knockback

ski.name: JUSTICE BLADE
desc: Casts a whirling blade to deal extra damage after Di Renjie attacks the target. During the period, automatically charges up to 3 blades. Each of Di Renjie's normal attack shortens the charge time for Justice Blade. (Justice Blade can trigger Attack FX)
study: Summon Justice Blade for additional damage

story:
Where there is light, there must be shadow. Where there is shadow there must be light. After Li house's Tang Dynasty was changed to Wu's Zhou Dynasty, the former prosperity can no longer shine a light into the dark corners. The bloody storm stirred up by the Empress Wu's ascendancy were still lingering around Chang'an, the capital city. Crime was rampant. Officials were corrupted. People inside and outside Chang'an were living under the dark cloud.
To stop her reign falling, Empress Wu assigned the Dali Temple to solve all the long-pending cases within a year without delay and misjudgment. Under tremendous political pressure, Dali Temple widely recruited talents around the country without asking their background.
A young man named Di Renjie drew the attention of Dali Temple by his distinctive martial skills, constantly sharp insight, and the special mechanical wheel he was carrying. Di Renjie came to Chang'an alone to find his parents. More clues revealed that the missing of his parents was related to the case about Li house that Dali Temple was investigating.
Di Renjie then devoted himself to the work in Dali Temple and helped solved all the cases, giving criminals no chance to escape. Though some cases were still unsettled, Empress Wu directly promoted Di Renjie to director of Dali Temple. However, at the night when Dali Temple welcomed their youngest director, two mysterious killers sneaked into the imperial palace and almost killed Empress Wu. Their weapons were a pair of mechanical wheel with blades hidden inside. A black net was falling upon Chang'an.

name: Sprite Auric
tips: Make the best choice of combat forms based on the battle situation.

ski.name: Impale
desc:
Human Form: Sprite Auric grows a sharp drill onto his arm that impales enemy units in a straight line, dealing physical damage and applying the Lacerate effect for 3s.
Lacerate Effect: Increases all damage inflicted by Sprite Auric on the target by 25% and slows the target's movement by 35%.
Liquid Form: Places spikes to deal magic damage to enemy units in the area and apply the Bleed effect for 3s.
Bleed Effect: Reduces the target's Movement Speed by 35% and Health Regen by 50%.
study: Inflicts damage and Slow.

ski.name: Fatal Thrust
desc:
Human Form: After channeling the energy for a short time, Sprite Auric thrusts in a target direction at the cost of 10% of his current Health, penetrating enemy units along the path and dealing additional damage based on the target's missing Health (adding 1 physical damage for every 4 missing Health of the target, up to 600). Sprite Auric also restores 25% of his own missing Health for every 1 enemy hero(es) hit.
Liquid Form: At the cost of 10% of his current Health, Sprite Auric deals multiple spike damage to enemy units in the area continuously for 3s. For every 1 enemy unit(s) hit, Sprite Auric restores his Health. Hitting enemy heroes doubles the healing effect. Sprite Auric can move but cannot use other abilities for the duration.
study: Deals damage at the cost of Health and gets healed.

ski.name: Liquefaction
desc: Sprite Auric enters into the Liquid form, transforming into mercury for 10s. Though being unable to launch basic attacks for the duration, he becomes immune to Slow and Root and reduces the Movement Speed of enemies in the area by 25%. He also gains bonus Damage Reduction, faster movement, and corresponding changes to his abilities. Each time Sprite Auric uses another ability in the Liquid form, the duration of Liquefaction is extended by 2s. Cast again to return to the Human form immediately and deal physical damage to surrounding units.
study: Switches to the Liquid form.

ski.name: Solid Strike
desc:
Human Form: Sprite Auric draws elementary energy to cover himself, reducing 50% of incoming damage for 2s, speeding up his movement by 30% for 4s, and empowering his next basic attack with additional physical damage and Root effect for 1.5s.
Liquid Form: 0.75s later, deals magic damage to enemy heroes in the area, causing Root for 1.5s. Also reduces Sprite Auric's damage taken by 50% for the duration.
study: Grants self buff and crowd control.

story:
It laid quietly in dirt at the deepest part of the Hidden Glen. For thousands of years, it witnessed wreak havoc of flames and the roaring of raging waves as well as the either noble or contemptible humanity that survived in the gap between these two forces. Gradually, its incomplete consciousness seemed to be complete, and it seemed to have gained a new life.
Finally, it recovered enough power and its broken body was melted into a block.
A body with enormous strength stood up slowly out of liquefied metal.
"From today on, I will be the new master on the battlefield!"
It swept all on the battlefield like a sharp blade falling from the sky. Its body was the most powerful weapon. A new elemental sprite had arrived and battlefield would change because of its arrival. It represented the strongest force among elemental planes and its name â€“ Sprite Auric â€“ would be engraved in everyone's mind!

name: Naya
tips: Cast the ultimate after hitting an enemy with Ability 1 to deal a burst of damage.

ski.name: Solid Slingshot
desc: Charges up for a short time and then fires a stone in a target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies along the path. If it hits an enemy hero, stuns the enemy hero for 0.7s, stacks the Indomitable status 4 times, reduces the current cooldown on this ability by 50%. The cooldown is reduced by 1s more for each additional enemy hero hit. (Only the first enemy hero hit is stunned and will not be stunned by this ability again within 2s.)
study: Causes damage and Stun.

ski.name: Swift Wings
desc: Naya stretches out her wings, dashing in a target direction. Recasts within 3s to dash again. Naya gains bonus Movement Speed during the dashes.
study: Dashes, may be for 2 times

ski.name: Raging Waves
desc: Tidal waves are formed in the target area that last for 5s and cause Slow. The Slow effect is enhanced based on Naya's Magic Power. After a short delay, a flock of birds throw twigs and pebbles into the waves, dealing magic damage to enemy units in the area. Naya gains 30% Cooldown Reduction from the waves.
study: Slows and deals damage to enemies in an area, while Naya gains Cooldown Reduction.

ski.name: Indomitability
desc: When enabled, it speeds up Naya's attacks for a short time and grants an additional bonus (50%) accordingly. Each of her basic attacks in that time deals magic damage plus the bonus from her Magic Power (the bonus will not damage towers). Whenever she gets a kill or assist, the cooldown or duration on this ability refreshes._Passive: Dealing damage with an ability places a stack of Indomitable against the target for 6s during which all damage dealt by Naya on the target is increased by 5%. (Max Stacks: 10, each basic attack adds a stack when Indomitability is enabled)
study: Increases the Attack Speed sharply. Basic attacks deal magic damage.

story:
Parents' arms were the safest harbor to their children, but Naya hadn't seen her father for a long time. Every time she asked where her father was, she was comforted and told that her father was on a trip around the world. However, her father failed to return home year after year. Naya couldn't wait any more.
One day, she went to the sea and set sail for her father, but a terrific sea storm came and capsized her small boat. While struggling, Naya saw her father stretching out his hands to her from the sky. Then, she saw a colorful feather floating on the waves. Fortunately, the feather saved her by granting her a pair of red wings.
Since then, whenever the waves roared, the winged girl carried twigs and pebbles from mountains to suppress the raging waves.

data: Soul Shiver: Slows down by 10% per stack for 3s.
study: Causes debuffs and extra damage.

story:
Through the Spring of Wisdom, the Greater God foresaw tragic scenes of Ragnarok in which gods perished and the World Tree burned into ashes. Thus, the Greater God used aurora to create Heradias, titled as the Goddess of Battle. Different from Freya, Heradias was asked to incite wars among mortals and spread flames of war across Midgard. When Heradias scrubbed blood from her armor, it was time for Freya to guide the souls of the dead in wars to Valhalla. Everlasting wars were needed to stop the twilight of gods - that was what the Greater God said.
As the arrival of Fimbulwinter, conflicts were frozen and those wars halted temporarily in Midgard. Nevertheless, the number of mortal beings died of cold and starvation were far greater than those killed in wars. The underworld was filled with ghosts of the innocent who were wandering in front of the Gate of Hell and suffering bitter cold. For such misery, Heradias' loyalty to the divine realm grew tangled. Heradias persuaded herself that the current misery of mortals would increase the gods' chance of winning against Ragnarok. If gods could survive, it must be easy for them to recover the mortal world. However, the illusion was completely shattered as she received the Greater God's order: Fimbulwinter was a warning of the coming of Regnarok, so more wars and more souls of warriors were needed to stop Regnarok at any cost, even sacrificing the entire Midgard.
Countless mortals had been scorched by the flames of war, and more blood must be drained in the prolonged winter. Heradias came to realize she was an accomplice of the gods of Asgard who only cared about themselves in the massacre. It was be too late to regret, but there was still one thing she could do. She cut off the chain which shackled Fenrir. In face of the wolf who can devour everything, she closed the eyes with a smile while hearing crows of Gullinkambi and breaths of Jormungand.
Heradias started the twilight of gods, but mortal beings got a chance to escape the net trap of fate placed by the gods.

name: Prometheus
tips: Focuses on hitting a crowd of enemy units as much as possible, while keeping a safe distance.

ski.name: Perseverance
desc: Grants 30% bonus Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds. One second later, a fiery eagle flies to Prometheus to remove control effects from him and empower his next two basic attacks with Life Steal.
study: Increase the Movement Speed, removes control effects, and grants Life Steal for basic attacks.

ski.name: Fire of Hope
desc: Summons a fireball upon a target area, dealing damage to and marking enemy heroes within the range for 6 seconds. After that, continuously deals damage and reduces their speed by 25% within 6 seconds. The units marked gets a stack of Kindling when taking damage from Prometheus' basic attacks and abilities, and will suffer extra damage at 3 stacks of Kindling.
study: Marks enemies to deal extra damage.

ski.name: Flame Chase
desc: Summons a chariot to the target location, dealing damage to and stunning nearby enemy units there for 1.5 seconds. When standing within a range of 450 from the chariot, Prometheus can cast this ability again to ride the chariot and dash forward in the Invincibility status. Prometheus will stay at the destination when the dash ends.
study: Dashes forward and stuns enemies.

ski.name: Thrill of Destiny
desc: Prometheus' basic attack bounces to two additional targets, dealing pure damage equal to a certain proportion of the attack damage to each additional target hit. After casting this ability, Prometheus gains bonus Attack Speed for his next two basic attacks within 4 seconds.
study: Increases the Attack Speed and bounces.
update: Basic Attack Speed â†‘ Damage Proportion â†‘

story:
It's been thousands of years since Prometheus stole the fire for humans. After being freed from the perpetual torture, Prometheus chose to settle in the mortal world. As humans developed thanks to fire, Prometheus sadly noticed that they also used fire to create weapons and destroy each other in wars. They would ruin the peace if let the behaviors continue, making Prometheusâ€™ gift of fire a great irony.
While running around to settle disputes, Prometheus happened to know that Pandora left her Box of Doom in the war of deities. At the bottom of the box, Hope still remained. To free humans from the fever of war and bring civilization back to the mortal world, Prometheus had no other choice, but to betray deities again and steal the Spark of Hope.

tips: Take advantage of the control effect of Silent Tornado to give enemies no chance to escape Eye of Hurricane.

ski.name: Silent Tornado
desc:
Fay unleashes a tornado with her Heaven Fan, propelling it forward to deal magic damage and apply control effects to enemies:
Upon creation of the tornado, it offers the strongest knock-back power and slows enemies 30% for 1s; As the tornado drifts forward, the knock-back effect gradually weakens, while the Slow effect can enhance up to 50%, lasting for 1s.
study: Deals damage and applies crowd controls against enemies.

ski.name: Eye of Hurricane
desc: Fay places an eye of hurricane, that grants vision, at a target place. If not triggered within 1s, it will become invisible. When an enemy moves close, it slows the enemy by 55% and explodes to form a hurricane after 0.8s. The hurricane will deal magic damage to enemy units within range and knock them up. Up to 2 such eye(s) can exist simultaneously.
study: Places the eyes of hurricane to apply crowd controls against enemies.

ski.name: Heaven Fan

Active: Fay unleashes the fan power to enhance the damage of her basic attacks (additional 50% effect on enemy heroes), getting the Puncture effect and ignoring enemies' dodge. Heaven Fan receives 1 Energy point(s) every 5s, up to 2 points (not affected by cooldown reduction). Each successful hit with an enhanced basic attack on an enemy hero reduces the charge time of this ability by 1s.
study: Enhances basic attacks, granting the Puncture effect and ignoring enemies' dodge.

ski.name: Wind Stride

study: Speeds up both Fay and nearby allied heroes, charging up the Heaven Fan.

story:
She had no name back then; people simply knew her as the fan vendor on the streets of a small town. Her small figure huddled behind the stall, embroidering fan surfaces. Let's call her "Little Fan". During the day, Little Fan embroidered flowers and birds, selling a few fans. At night, she used the money to buy incense and offer prayers to the Buddha with unwavering devotion. The Buddha was moved by her sincerity and watched over her from the heavens, cherishing her like a small flower in the palm of his hand.
The small town was peaceful and prosperous, its residents living in harmony and love. But calamity is blind; a predestined mountain fire swept through the entire town. The Buddha couldn't bear to see his devotee, Little Fan, suffer from this disaster. He revealed his divine form, intending to persuade her to leave and ensure her survival.
However, Little Fan knelt down and refused to leave. She had been abandoned as an infant by her biological parents, but the kind-hearted townspeople took her in. Each family nurtured and educated her as their own. Though they had no blood relation, they were already like family, and the small town was her home. She couldn't abandon her loved ones to their fate and fled alone. Little Fan implored the Buddha to withdraw the mountain fire, willingly enduring torment in this life without hesitation.
Moved by Little Fan's plea, the Buddha sighed lightly and granted her request. But he also reminded her that tampering with destiny was a grave taboo in the celestial realm. The alteration of fate for the small town came at the cost of Little Fan's merits and life in this lifetime, and it was a one-time occurrence. Grateful tears streamed down Little Fan's face, and she readily agreed. She burned herself in the Samadhi True Fire, using her own flesh to shield the townspeople from the catastrophe.
Reborn from the flames, Little Fan attained enlightenment and became an immortal due to her sacrifice for the lives of many. The townspeople were grateful for her salvation and built hundreds of temples in her honor. She watched over the townspeople, rejoicing in their newfound life. Even as an immortal, she continued to protect them in the heaven.
Yet, at that time, the little celestial being had no awareness that destined calamity cannot be avoided. Who could have anticipated that a hundred years later, a mischievous monkey would intrude upon the celestial realm, causing havoc and toppling the alchemy furnace of the Lord Lao Zi? The Samadhi True Fire raged unceasingly, scorching the desert, mountains, and even engulfing Little Fan's hometown in flames. She watched from above as her family members fled in panic, consumed by flames. Her heart raced, but she was helpless. She remembered the warning the Buddha had given her when she became an immortal - she must not violate the heavenly laws or interfere in the mortal realm; otherwise, it would result in perpetual punishment.
Seeing the flames closing in on her own robes, the infant in swaddling clothes choking on the thick smoke, Little Fan could no longer remain idle. She pulled out fan after fan, using them to fan the flames from the sky to the ground. She replaced a broken fan with another in an endless cycle, until calluses formed on her hands and rivers of sweat flowed ceaselessly. Finally, she even broke into the treasure room of the Lord Lao Zi, toppling the servant boys, and stole the Heaven Fan capable of extinguishing all things. She risked her life to fan the flames downward...
The fire in the small town finally extinguished, and the entire town was saved once again by her. However, despite her merits in saving lives, she had forcibly taken a divine treasure, harmed her celestial friends, and violated heavenly laws. As punishment, she was condemned to endure perpetual torment at the Flame Mountain, nurturing the scorched and tattered Heaven Fan with her immortal power, forever unable to step outside even one foot.
With the crippled Heaven Fan in her possession, Little Fan descended into the depths of the Flame Mountain. The yellow sand filled the air, and there were scarce traces of smoke, even the small demons on the desert enduring hunger and thirst. Being inherently kind-hearted, Little Fan used her magic to summon water sources and vegetation, erecting shaded earthen houses. Finally, she took up the Heaven Fan and tried to fan the flames of the Flame Mountain smaller - remarkably, she succeeded. Countless demons and humans flocked to her, settling in the shelter she provided, living in harmony as if in a utopia. The residents of the Flame Mountain revered her as Princess Fay, a title she accepted with a smile.
During the day, Fay engaged in banter with them, but when the moonlight filled the desert, she sat alone on the dunes, gazing southward. South of the desert was her longed-for hometown and family.
