Release the skill again to teleport Yanbing Cao to Warrior Spirit's point. If too far away from its host, Warrior Spirit will disappear and fuse with the host. Passive: Warrior Spirit continuously deals area magical damage to enemy units nearby. Its movement speed increases when away from the host. Host's mana increases when fused with Warrior Spirit.
study: Commands the Warrior Spirit to deal damage, and can teleport to the Warrior Spirit's point.

ski.name: LOYALTY OF THE CAOS
desc: In Fusion State: Commands the Warrior Spirit to strike forward, dealing magical damage in a fan area and knocking off enemy units. In Separation State: Commands the Warrior Spirit to dash, dealing magical damage and stunning enemy units on its path. Passive: Warrior Spirit deals magical damage to enemy units nearby when fusing with or leaving its host.
study: Deals area damage and causes a control effect

ski.name: WARRIOR SPIRIT WRATH
desc: Warrior Spirit roars, dealing magical damage to and stunning the enemy units nearby. Passive: Host's HP Regen and Mana Regen increase when fused with Warrior Spirit.
study: Deals area damage and causes a control effect

story: Coming Soon!

name: Xia Ling
tips: æŽŒæ¡å¥½æ—¶æœºåˆ©ç”¨æ— é‡æ¸…é£Žè§„é¿ä¼¤å®³ï¼Œè¿›è€Œåå‡»æˆ–æ²»ç–—è‡ªå·±ã€‚

ski.name: ELEMENTAL LIGHT
desc: Ring a bell to summon elemental light which strikes enemies in front of Xia Ling to deal Magical Damage and Blind targets for 2s.
study: Area of effect damage, Blind

ski.name: DRUNKEN MOON
desc: Summon multiple shadows of Li Xuanyuan which strike a target enemy multiple times, dealing Magical Damage and Stunning the target for a short time.
study: Magical Damage, Stun

ski.name: PURIFYING WIND
desc: Xia Ling summons Li Xuanyuan to embolden her spirit and greatly increase her Health Regen and Spell Power. Cast again and Li Xuanyuan will deal a massive amount of Magical Damage to enemies in the target area and Stun them for 1s.
study: Absorb and reflect damage

ski.name: UNSTOPPABLE TEMPEST
desc: Summon Li Xuanyuan for self protection, who absorbs all Damage and grants immunity to disables for 2s. After absorbing damage, select a direction and unleash a beam of light which deals damage (up to 600) based on the amount of absorbed damage. If the counterattack is not cast, absorbed damage will be converted to Health and Mana.
data: Increase Magical Damage by 30/40/50/60 for every 100 points of damage
Increase Health by /20/30/40 for every 100 points of damage
Increase Mana by 5/10/15/20 for every 100 points of damage
study: Absorb and reflect damage

story: Coming Soon!

name: Beiluo Shimen
tips: åœŸçŸ³å·¨é¾™åœ¨åˆ°è¾¾ç»ˆç‚¹åŽè¿˜ä¼šç»§ç»­é£žè¡Œï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨è¿™ç‚¹æ”»å‡»æ›´å¤šçš„æ•Œäººã€‚

ski.name: SHI LINGMING
desc: Summons his Guardian Spirit, Shi Lingming, to smash physical damage in a target area, automatically chasing after nearby enemies. hi Lingming deals area damage and causes Stun with a flurry attack for 0.75s every 2 attacks. Shi Lingming is immune to magical damage and disappears for 5s after a certain number of attacks.
study: Area magical damage, summons Shi Lingming
update: Damage â†‘ Effect â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: STONE WALL
desc: Casts out a stone wall in a target direction to damage, slowdown and knockback enemies along its path. Wall breaks into rubble at end; affected enemies suffer Root for 0.5s every 1s. Lasts 5s. Passive: Shi Lingming deals more damage nearby rubble, and Beiluo Shimen is immune to CC while nearby rubble.
study: Summons a massive rock wall to knockback enemies and generate a rubble zone

ski.name: STONE DRAGONRIDER
desc: Beiluo Shimen mounts an almighty stone dragon toward a target point, with dragon continuing after dismount before vanishing. Dragon deals punishing damage to enemies touched while causing knockup for 1s. Grants immunity to CC while riding dragon.
study: Summons and rides an almighty dragon to a target location,  dealing damage and slows movement

ski.name: STONE SHRUG
desc: Each basic attack or ability concentrates 1 stack of Stone Might. Stack up 5 times to summon stone arms that increase basic attack range and buff damage dealt. Hitting a target ambushes them, causing Beiluo Shimen to relocate there. Cooldown: 4s. Shi Lingming will focus on ambushed targets.
study: Summons stone arms that increase attack range and damage dealt

story: Coming soon!

name: Momo
tips: åˆç†è¿ç”¨å‡‹é›¶ä¹‹èˆžæä¾›å¼ºå¤§çš„å‡ä¼¤æ•ˆæžœæ¥æŠµæŒ¡ä¼¤å®³

ski.name: LEAP ATTACK
desc: Momo leaps and causes area of effect physical damage to targets with two swords. It`s immune to the disabler effect. Deal bonus physical damage and the stun effect to enemies in the center for 0.5s.
study: Leap to the target zone to deal bonus damage and the stun effect to enemies in the center.

ski.name: ABSOLUTE CRUSHER
desc: Momo slashes in the target direction with the absolute power to deal damage and stun enemies for 0.2s. When it hits the enemy heroes, it stops and can release a greater power to increase the cast range, cause damage and stun enemies for 0.5s. It gains Hyper Armor when it uses the skill.
study: Leap to cause damage and stun. Hit the enemy to release the stronger power.

ski.name: WITHERING DANCE
desc: Momo hugs the ememy tightly to cause damage for 5s. During it, Momo grants immunity to disables and gains damage reduction. After releasing the skill for 1 second, it can cancel it on its own.
study: Controls enemies, deals damage to them continuously and grants Damage Reduction
update: Damage Reduction â†‘ Damage â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: FROST EXPLOSION
desc: Deals damage and the frost effect to enemies with the frost pain. Enemies in the destination will be dealt with Bonus Physical Damage. Charge for 6 stacks to release. Attack once to charge for 1 stack. Use common skills to charge for 2 stacks. Use Withering Dance to charge for 5 stacks.
study: Damages and frosts enemies to deal Bonus Physical Damage to enemies in the destination

story: æ¥è‡ªå¼‚ä¸–ç•Œçš„å®‰å…¹å¯¹è¿™ä¸ªä¸–ç•Œå‘å‡ºäº†å¾æœçš„å®£å‘Šï¼Œè‹±é­‚å¤§é™†æž•æˆˆå¾…æ—¦ï¼Œæ—¶åˆ»å‡†å¤‡ç€åº”å¯¹è¿™ä¸ªå¯æ€•çš„æ•Œæ‰‹ã€‚ä½†çº³è¨åŠ›å…‹å´é™·å…¥äº†æ²‰å¯‚ï¼Œå‰åŽ»ä¾¦æŸ¥æƒ…å†µçš„æ–¥å€™å‘çŽ°å¤§å¢“åœ°å¤§é—¨ç´§é—­ï¼Œè¢«æžå…¶å¼ºåŠ›çš„é˜²æŠ¤ç»“ç•Œç‰¢ç‰¢ç½©ä½ï¼Œåºžå¤§çš„å†›é˜µåœ¨åœ°é¢ä¹‹ä¸‹é›†ç»“ï¼Œè§„æ¨¡ä¹‹å¤§ç”šè‡³å¼•å‘å°è§„æ¨¡çš„åœ°éœ‡ã€‚è¿™ä¸€æƒ…å†µè®©äººä»¬æ›´åŠ ç´§å¼ ï¼Œä»–ä»¬æ— ä»Žå¾—çŸ¥çº³è¨åŠ›å…‹ä¹‹ä¸­åœ¨é…é…¿ä»€ä¹ˆæ›´åŠ é»‘æš—çš„é˜´è°‹ã€‚ä»¤äººä¸å®‰çš„æ°›å›´ä¸­ï¼Œä¸€ä½æ¼†é»‘çš„è‹±é›„æŒºèº«è€Œå‡ºï¼Œå¸å¼•äº†æ‰€æœ‰äººçš„ç›®å…‰ã€‚è¿™ä½æ¼†é»‘çš„è‹±é›„é›„å£®é­æ¢§ï¼Œèº«ç€æ¼†é»‘æ— æš‡çš„é‡è£…æ¿ç”²ï¼Œæ‰‹æŒä¸€å¯¹ç¬”ç›´çš„é‡å‰‘ã€‚ä»–è‡ªç§°å†’é™©è€…èŽ«èŽ«ï¼Œæ“…é•¿è§£å†³å„ç§å§”æ‰˜ï¼Œå°¤å…¶æ˜¯å¯¹æŠ—ä¸æ­»æ—ä»¥åŠæ¶é­”ã€‚ä»–è‡ªç§°å¯ä»¥ååŠ©äººä»¬å¯¹æŠ—ææ€–çš„çº³è¨åŠ›å…‹å¤§åŸå¢“ã€‚è‹±é›„çš„å‡ºçŽ°ä¸å•»äºŽé›ªä¸­é€ç‚­ï¼Œåœ¨èŽ«èŽ«çš„æ´»è·ƒè¡¨çŽ°ä¹‹ä¸‹ï¼Œè‹±é­‚å¤§é™†å‡»é€€äº†å¤§æ¶é­”ä»¥åŠæ¶é­”å¥³ä»†å›¢å¯¹äºŽåŸŽå¸‚çš„è¢­å‡»ï¼Œå¹¶å°†é­æ¢§çš„ç”²è™«å°†é¢†æ‰€çŽ‡é¢†çš„ä¸æ­»å¤§å†›æ‹’ä¹‹é—¨å¤–ã€‚èŽ«èŽ«ä¸€è·ƒæˆä¸ºè‹±é­‚å¤§é™†æœ€ä¸ºçŸ¥åçš„æ˜Žæ—¥ä¹‹æ˜Ÿï¼Œä¸Žæ— æ•°è‹±é›„ç»“ä¸‹äº†æ·±åŽšçš„æƒ…è°Šï¼Œä»–è°¨æ…Žçš„æ€§æ ¼ä¸Žå¼ºå¤§çš„æˆ˜åŠ›æˆä¸ºäº†å†’é™©è€…è¿™ä¸ªè¡Œå½“ä¸­çš„ç¾Žè°ˆã€‚ç„¶è€Œï¼Œåªæœ‰èŽ«èŽ«ï¼Œå’Œä»–èº«è¾¹çš„é‚£ä½ç¾Žä¸½çš„æ­æ¡£æ˜Žç™½ï¼Œä¸€åˆ‡éƒ½æ˜¯èŽ«èŽ«çš„æ™ºè°‹ï¼Œä¸€åˆ‡éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†çº³è¨åŠ›å…‹çš„æ— ä¸Šè£è€€ï¼

name: Mousia
tips: Increase speed by using your abilities or gear to deal more ability damage.

ski.name: WANNA BE RICH?
desc: Mousia hurls treasure at a target, dealing physical damage and causing Greed. Abilities that hit during this time also have their cooldowns reset. Greed: Enemy is dazzled by money, reducing Armor and Magic Resist.
study: Physical Damage and Armor Reduction

ski.name: INHERATANCE
desc: Floods a target direction with treasure, dealing magic damage to enemies affected and greatly reducing Movement Speed to enemies struck 3 times.
study: Throw treasures in the specified direction to deal damage

ski.name: CASHBOX
desc: Mousia leaps up, pouring treasure out of her pouch, dealing magic damage to an area and granting invulnerability while leaping. Passive - Pearl Shield: Treasure regularly falls out of the pouch to create a shield that blocks damage. When broken, the shield explodes and the dispersed treasure Stuns nearby enemies for 1 second, dealing low damage. Passive - Nimble: Bonus Attack Speed increases Mousia's ability damage.
study: Pours treasurs to deals damage in a zone

ski.name: BESPANGLED
desc: Takes out a dazzling jewel to deal physical damage and continuously blind enemies within range, making Mousia invisible in the area. A target can be blinded for up to 1 sec. Passive: Both Attack Speed and Movement Speed increase when any of her abilities deals damage.
study: Summons pearls to deals Damage and Blind

story: As a patron saint of the poor, Mousia tried taking issue with the gods about the thievery, but the gods weren't worried about such a trivial little demi-god like Mousia. Refusing to give up, Mousia took matters into her own hands. This little critter is always taking risks standing up for the little guy out there.

name: Omega
tips: Your energy decides your role as a great general or a nameless soldier.

ski.name: Nuclear Impulse
desc: Omega locks down a target area and releases its power after a short delay, bursting out a strong pulse, dealing magic damage, and attaching a Puncture status to enemy units. Omega recovers some Energy and Health when hitting a target. Puncture: Slows the targets pierced by this pulse and increases the damage, up to 3 stacks, for 5s.
study: Deals damage and recovers Health.

ski.name: Countering Barrier
desc: Places a barrier to disturb enemy units, dealing magic damage and blinding them. Passive: If Omega is defeated, places one barrier in the target spot. If the damage taken within 3s is more than 25% of the Max Health, places two barriers around. For every 3s, this effect may be triggered 1 time(s).
study: Deals damage and blinds the target.

ski.name: Destroying Mode
desc: Grants Omega dramatically enhanced abilities, bonus range of basic attacks, damage reduction, and decreased energy cost for abilities, but at the cost of slower movement speed. Passive: Born with the effect. All actions of Omega consumes core energy which will restore with time. The energy recovery speed is increased in the Destroying Mode. When out of energy, movement speed drops by 30% and damage drops by 30%.
data: Energy Cost for Movement per Second: 2
study: Gains significant buffs.

ski.name: Eraser Bullet
desc: Summons a laser from the sky to deal magic damage and stun enemies within the range. Enemies attacked by the laser are marked and give their vision to Omega. 2.5 seconds later, fires a large number of bullets against the marked enemies within a certain range to deal damage multiple times. This effect is triggered immediately when Omega enters Destroying Mode.
study: Causes damage and stun.

story:
Something unusual were bound to happen when the two mad scientists, Dr. Madd and Vince, met each other. They were connected by an old document which revealed a legendary story about the God of Chaos - Before fulfilling the ambition of unifying the continent, the God of Chaos disappeared from the world, leaving part of its power to form the Core of Chaos - Obviously, both of them were drooling at that powerful core.
With common interests in black science, Dr. Madd and Vince entered into agreement soon. They tracked down the Core of Chaos at the ruins of the God's palace and finally managed to obtain it after exploding lots of acid bombs in front of the palace. In their laboratory, the mysterious core was integrated with genetic and mechanical technologies, taking a new shape of life named "Omega".
However, before the two scientists celebrated the great success, Omega tore a big hole in the wall of the laboratory and escaped under their eyes. Neither Dr. Madd's mutant servants nor Vince's wind-up guardian could be a match for Omega who was equipped with multiple guns. After getting rid of its creators, the powerful experimental object started its journey on the unfamiliar land. Though feeling headless, it was guided by something in the deepest of its body to find the very edge of the continent. Omega was not aware that the destiny of whole world would be changed because of the journey which involved in the balance of light and darkness, as well as the tangles of past and future. The two scientists were still following Omega's footprints, while its real master was waiting in the throne far away. The adventure for Omega just begun.

name: Pandora Jackert
tips: It's important to choose the shape to shift into according to your own gears.

ski.name: GLORY OF NASARICK
desc: Salutes the target and deals magic damage. The target will also get rooted for 1 second and move much slower after that due to embarrassment. The caster is in Untouchable status during the salute.
study: Cause damage, root and slowdown

ski.name: NOISE WAVE
desc: Sings with astonishing volume to cause damage and slowdown against the enemies around for 4 sec. The enemies trying to leave will receive bonus damage.
data: Slow Effect: 15%/20%/25%/30%, lasts for 2 sec after leaving range
study: Cause damage and slowdown

ski.name: PHANTOM TWIN
desc: Jackert can take the shape of any enemy to become capable of using all the skills of this enemy with slightly weakened effects. After the shapeshift, his movement speed will be increased by 30% for 3 sec. Untouchable at the moment of shapeshift. Passive: smaller loss when selling gears
data: Gear Sold: 85%/90%/95% of the original price
study: Transform and fight in the shape of enemy

ski.name: TERRIFIC CHARM
desc: When attacking or casting skills, has a chance to trigger charm bonus which enhances damage ability and damage reduction no matter whether the caster is transformed or not.
study: Enhance attack and skill effects

story: Welcome to the treasury of Nazarick! I'm Pandora Jackert, the treasury's guardian and also the chief of the Forty-One Supreme Beings. For you're here now, you must have fought against other guardians created by Lord Aniz. If you judge me by experience and treat me as a funny clown, you're completely wrong. Pandora Jackert is not good at boasting, but is undoubtedly the most important force of the great tomb as well as the ultimate weapon of Nazarick. My shapeshift ability allows me to substitute any of the guardians when necessary. Pandora Jackert is turned out to be an all-rounder. Yeah, ALL-ROUNDER. Uh-oh, since you've stretched out the weapon, I'm afraid I can't continue the self-introduction. If you're determined to enter the treasury, I can only do one thing. Take your life at the gate.

name: Master Crane
tips: Choose an appropriate place and break into the enemy's rear area, killing the target with the full set of abilities.

ski.name: Cloud Path
desc: Ground Mode: Master Crane dashes and kicks upward, stunning the enemy units kicked for 0.1s and dealing physical damage to the target as well as enemy units around the target. Then, jumps backward and gains 30% bonus Movement Speed for 2s. If no hero is kicked, flies into the air when arriving at the destination. Fly Mode: Master Crane dives to the target, stunning the target for 0.1s and dealing physical damage to the target as well as enemy units around the target. Then, jumps backward. Passive: Master Crane gains 15% bonus Movement Speed for every 3s of flying, up to 3 stacks. The bonus Movement Speed lasts for 2s after landing and also increases the damage dealt during the dive at a certain percentage.
study: Dashes forward and deals damage or flies.

ski.name: Power Strike
desc: Ground Mode: Master Crane unleashes his chi power to deal physical damage to enemy units and slow them by 50% for 1.5s. In his next basic attack, Master Crane dashes to the target, dealing additional damage to the target and enemy units within a radius of 400, as well as healing himself. Fly Mode: Master Crane changes the air flow to remove the fog in front, getting vision of that area and revealing hidden units for 5s.
study: Causes damage and Movement Slow. Enhances basic attacks and removes the fog.

ski.name: Infinite Wind
desc: Master Crane dashes forward with a hurricane to deal physical damage to enemy units along his path and stops at the destination. After a delay, the hurricane returns to the starting point, dealing damage to enemy units along the path again and knocking them up for 1s. Untouchable during the dash.
study: Dashes to cause damage and knockup.

ski.name: Feather Darts
desc: Master Crane's next basic attack within 5s releases 5 feather darts, dealing physical damage to enemy units multiple times. Then, Master Crane takes the feather darts back to kill enemy units. When going back, each feather dart deals physical damage equal to 6% of the target's Health lost (Max Damage: 120). Casting this ability resets Master Crane's basic attack immediately.
study: Deals deadly damage and resets basic attacks.

story:
When Crane was young, he and White Bear were the only two who passed severe trials of Master Turtle, the greatest Kungfu Master along River Jingxiu, and became his students.
They competed with each other, but they were also close friends. Compared with impetuous Crane, Bear was given higher expectations by Master Turtle for his cautious and hardworking characteristics.
Several years later when Crane entered the hall for his graduate exam, he found Master Turtle dying on the ground with blood all over him, and saw a white back in horror before he was stunned.
Crane has grown to be a gentle master after experiencing the rebellion of his school. When noticing the invasion plan of the bear tribes in the north, Master Crane hit the road of adventure alone, looking into the death of his master.

name: Siren
tips: Plan ahead for casting abilities in awareness of the enhancement status.

ski.name: Thunderstorm
desc: Siren unleashes a Thunderstorm, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path. Siren's next Thunderstorm is enhanced with bonus damage equal to 25% of the target's Health lost, up to 375, and 50% Health restored from Storm Charm. Only one enhancement applies at a time. The ability damage drops to 75% against non-hero units.
study: Deals damage to enemies along the path.

ski.name: Furious Wave
desc: Summons a Furious Wave to deal magic damage to enemies. When reaching its maximum distance, it returns to deal magic damage to enemies it touches and stun them for 0.75s. Siren's next Furious Wave is enhanced with a 1.5-second stun and 50% Health restored from Storm Charm. Only one enhancement applies at a time.
study: Deals damage to enemies and controls them.

ski.name: Violent Dash
desc: Siren turns into a hurricane and dashes forward, shooting lightning arrows that deal magic damage against up to 2 enemy heroes around the destination. When Siren reaches the destination, drag the joystick to have Siren dash again towards the joystick, and no damage is dealt this time. The next basic attack after the first dash deals additional damage, but using abilities or basic attacks cancels the second dash. The next Violent Dash is enhanced with more powerful lightning arrows against all enemy heroes around the destination, 40% bonus damage of both lightning arrows and enhanced basic attack, as well as 50% Health restored from Storm Charm. Only one enhancement applies at a time.
study: Dashes forward and deals damage.

ski.name: Storm Charm
desc: Passive: Grants an additional opportunity to use the ability every 10s. When an enemy hero dies in a radius, a 10-second storm cloud appears. It flies to Siren when she is within 500 range, restoring her Health and adding 5-second charge.
study: Absorbs the storm cloud to restore Health and improve the charge.

story:
Siren was a nightmare for all mariners. This violent Spirit of Storm could drive waves to roar on the sea.
But everything changed after she picked up one baby. The cries of the baby provoked the motherhood of Siren who poured all her feelings into the baby. However, happiness didn't last long. The child got ill. It got a fatal illness that could not be cured in the mortal world. Siren turned to Poseidon and asked him for help, but the arrogant Poseidon ignored her request.
Siren turned angry. Her anger flames burned the whole sea, and even the most valiant soldiers of Poseidon shivered in storm. Poseidon finally surrendered. He turned in a secret treasure of God which could save one life at the expense of another life.
Siren used that secret treasure. The Spirit of Storm that ravaged the sea disappeared and the baby was found and adopted by a fisherman by the sea. Siren's solicitude for the child turned into the heart of magical sea and sank to the depth of the sea forever.

name: Prosper
tips: Switch between different modes for different ability effects to deal with various battle situations.

ski.name: Rampant Blast / Windfall
desc: Prosper dashes forward a distance of 800, dealing physical damage to all targets along his path. If he collides with an enemy hero, he will stop dashing to deal physical damage to all targets in a radius of 400 around him and knock them up for 0.5s. Float mode is enabled after casting this ability. For Float mode: Prosper dashes forward a distance of 800, dealing physical damage to all targets along his path. The enemy hero collided by him will suffer physical damage and be knocked back a distance of 400. The damage and knock-back effects can only occur once against the same enemy hero.
study: Dash, damage, and control

ski.name: Ground Shock / Wise Money
desc: Jumps off the ground to deal physical damage to all targets in a radius of 600 around Prosper and slow them by 25% for 3s. The Slow effect increases by 5% every distance of 100 from Prosper, stacking up to 5 times. Float mode is enabled after casting this ability. For Float mode: Prosper spins the Bliss Jade to spit out coins in a radius of 600 around him, dealing physical damage to all targets in the area and rooting them for 0.5s. For 3s after hitting a target, Prosper gains bonus Attack Speed and converts 30% of the damage of his basic attack into true damage.
study: Area damage, control, and buff

ski.name: Treasure Boom / Endless Wealth
desc: Prosper jumps high in the air with the Money Toad, and then lands at the spot chosen to generate a special circle with a radius of 800 around him. Within the circle always centered on Prosper, all targets are slowed by 35%. After 1.5s, Prosper spins the Bliss Jade to draw all targets in the field near to him, and spins it again 3s later to draw enemies. Then, deals physical damage once to all targets in the field and slows them for 3s. Grants Prosper 40% Damage Reduction and reduces his Movement Speed to 200 for the duration. Float mode is enabled after casting this ability. For Float mode: Prosper jumps high in the air with the Money Toad, and then chooses a spot to land after a while, dealing physical damage to enemy targets in a radius of 800 around him and knocking them up for 0.5s. The shorter the distance, the faster the landing speed. Prosper gains 40% Damage Reduction for 3s after landing.
study: Dash, damage, and control

ski.name: Tides of Fortune
desc: Floating Fortune: Prosper enters into Float mode after casting an ability in Normal mode. Prosper gets back to Normal mode after casting an ability in Float mode. Float mode lasts for 2s. (Acquired without learning) Fading Gold: Prosper's Attack Speed is increased; While in Normal mode, every 3 basic attacks switches Prosper's mode to Float; While in Float mode, his basic attack deals additional damage in an area once and grants bonus Physical Life Steal (halved against non-hero unit), then switches his mode back to Normal. Money Bag: While using Fading Gold against enemies, Prosper receives 2 Gold per non-hero unit hit and 8 Gold per enemy hero unit hit.
study: Strengthened, bonus Gold

story:
In a remote village, a little boy named Prosper was believed to have the ability to bring good fortune and wealth, but he himself doubted that.
Feeling bored of being enshrined and worshiped by people every day, Prosper attempted to escape from the shrine for outside world many times. Eventually, he gave up because of people's strong belief on him and himself being the last hope that kept them alive.
When Prosper was about to comprise with his life in the shrine, a three-legged toad broke in suddenly and tried to take him away, revealing his previous life as a deity of wealth. The toad was aware of his hesitation and firmly believed that he was still the deity who treated others with kindness and generosity. After being enlightened by the toad, Prosper blew into the Bliss Jade and spitted out countless gold coins, fulfilling his promise to help the poor before leaving.

name: Hades
tips: Use the control effect of Fated Curse wisely.

ski.name: Incineration
desc: Consumes Health to increase Attack and Movement Speed continuously. During the period, getting ability damage will interrupt it and bring out a shield to block the damage. The buffs will continue to work for a while after the interruption.
data: Health Cost: 3% of Max Health per second
study: Consumes Health to gain buffs and resist attacks from enemy's abilities.

ski.name: Fated Curse
desc: Builds a magic array in the target area and starts sacrificing after it is fully charged, dealing damage to the enemies in the area and causing Fear. If one unit is killed before the sacrifice, all enemies within the area will enter Fear status once. Passive: Drains enemy's Health to support Hades, recovering his Health for kills. The healing effect is halved for assists.
data: Max Health of the Hero Killed: 20%/25%/30%/35%, healing effect halved for assists
Max Health of the Non-Hero Killed: 15%/20%/25%/30%
study: Deals area damage and gives passive buffs for kills.

ski.name: Whisper of Sin
desc: Tortures enemies with the nether force. The enemies may lose Health while moving due to force explosion. Hades' basic attacks against these enemies deals additional magic damage.
data: Nether Magic Damage: 17%/25%/33% of the distance moved
Bonus Magic Damage for Basic Attack: 50/75/100
study: Deals magic damage and provides enemy debuffs.

ski.name: Omnipotence
desc: Grants Hades an almighty insight which arouses his interest in chasing down tottering enemy heroes. The weaker the enemy, the more exciting Hades becomes.
data: Target's Health < 40%: Target's vision acquired & Movement Speed +10%/15%/20%/25%
study: Gives buffs according to the Health of heroes nearby.

story:
The great High God was bothered by the appointment of his three sons on Mount Titans. Hades, Poseidon, and Zeus were all outstanding among gods and good options for governing the world. The High God found it difficult to make decisions.
Hades was not worried at all. Thinking about his credits, he was confident that his father would choose him to be the human ruler. However, the partiality of the High God shattered the wish of Hades â€“ Zeus became the supreme ruler of the human world while Hades could only govern Netherworld and never have a chance to be with sunlight and moonlight.
Hades felt disappointed and became colder and colder.
